PIPR_Description: PetBookings powers real-time online reservations with instant confirmation for the $4.5B professional pet care industry. The first of its kind in this specific vertical, PetBookings lets pet owners book a boarding reservation from petbookings.com or directly from a professional pet care facility's website.   Tens of million pet care reservations are booked each year by phone. PetBookings aims to capitalize on the growing trend of online booking. PetBookings also feels the platform can be used as a springboard to participate in the entire $60B pet industry.

DreamLease is a marketplace platform that helps non-professional landlords lease and manage their own properties.  We do this by matching landlords with local real estate professionals on an as-needed basis.   	    Today, most "accidental landlords" are stuck choosing between doing all the grunt work themselves and hiring expensive property managers who charge for year-long relationships even though they are only needed a few times a year.  DreamLease solves this problem with the industry's first "on-demand property management."   	    There are many platforms out there today that help property owners find plumbers and handymen or advertise their properties on beautiful mapping products. Only DreamLease helps landlords find real estate professionals to interface with maintenance professionals on their behalf or show their properties to prospective tenants when they are vacant.

Eko USA, Inc. is a Dallas, TX based start up manufacturer of the all new Eko™ Compact Motorhome – the world's first green motorhome.  Built on the Dodge Ram ProMaster chassis, Eko™ is designed for Baby Boomers and active families who are looking for a lower price point, fuel savings, sustainability, and maneuverability when purchasing a new RV for travel and vacations.  The Eko™ Compact Motorhome will be sold through select RV dealers across the United States.   Eko™ is a true multipurpose motorhome which sleeps up to four, provides clever storage solutions, and is meticulously furnished with the technologies, functions, and modern amenities you want.    Eko™ is designed for sustainable Rving.  The interior is completely solar powered and its fuel-efficiency is unmatched by any motorhome on the market today.  Going green is our mantra as we believe proper Rving can contribute to sustaining our atmosphere.  Welcome to a brand new era of smart RVing – The all new Eko™.

Problem: People want to sell their classic cars  but cannot find the right buyer. Putting a for sale  sign on the car and parking it on the front lawn  does not get the car in front of qualified buyers.  And neither does the antiquated method of parking  it on a dealer's lot and selling it on consignment.   	Solution: We handle the entire process for them from start to finish.  We send out a professional photographer to get 50 high resolution photos and 5 minutes of video of the car.   	We build a simple website for each car, using the  photos and video.   	We then do Pay Per Click advertising to send qualified  buyers from all over the world to the website.   	In the past 2 months, we have helped our customers  find buyers in 10 different countries, including Sweden,  Canada, Italy, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, England,  France, and Australia.   	We are currently selling 6 cars a week.  Total upfront cost per car is $515, average gross income per car  is $1,400.

I donated my kidney because of a tweet in 2011. Since then, I have become an activist for kidney donors. I've mentored others going through the kidney donation process ever since I donated.  There are a lot of things wrong in the United States when it comes to long-term care and tracking of live organ donors. While I immediately responded when I saw the need for a kidney, most people are more pragmatic. They need to see harder evidence in order to decide to donate an organ.  I will also be campaigning for a national registry of live organ donors. Giving non-monetary incentives like lifetime health care (we have to be extremely healthy to donate in the first place) would help to take care of the 90+ thousand people waiting for a kidney right now.

Anomo's core mission is to help the world meet the people they need.  Humans are born into this world as social creatures, and our successes are highly dependent on the people we meet from 1st grade friends to college mates to significant others to business partners. But the challenge is that we all inherently have some degree of social anxiety when meeting new people.  Anomo solves this problem with a new "multi-identity" social app that provides the easiest and safest way to chat and meet new people around you. It allows you to keep all your personal info confidential behind a multi-identity profile, and only reveal private info (pics, job, name, etc) to people with whom you have positive interactions with.  This huge social problem is not addressed by current apps.  For example, Facebook helps you stay connected to only your EXISTING FRIENDS, and current meeting apps like Highlight and Badoo completely compromise your safety and privacy. Anomo has filed a non-provisional patent.

Are you a restaurant or other small business owner? Our Volo engine, powered by a temperature difference, generates electricity.  Three markets identified to date - home generator market, DIY off grid marketplace, and third world countries lacking either electrical delivery infrastructure or gasoline infrastructure.

The engine runs off of any temperature difference, from burning waste, wood, natural gas, solar concentration, waste heat.

There is no intake of fuel into the engine or exhaust from the engine.

The design targets for the engine are 1KW output at 450 F temperature difference.

The size of the engine is approximately 6' long x 16" in diameter and weighs 200lbs.

Our target system costs are approximately $2 / Watt in system cost (Solar ~ $3 / Watt).

Avivid's electrocoagulation process (US Pat #8,500,989 B2 Aug 6, 2013) solves the problem of scaling to large water volumes a 130 year old solution. Liberté! is a historical fiction action adventure stealth game that takes place during the Haitian Revolution. It's a single player, third person point of view game that's open world. The main character, Jacques Armand, has to make his way across Saint Domingue to a port where he can get passage to Louisiana. During his journey across the island, he encounters marauding slaves, military, displace nobility, zombies, voodoo priests and dangerous wildlife. He has to use stealth, agility, and weaponry skills to prevail. All the while, he collects Mardi Gras beads and pieces of a document. Once he's on board a ship, if he survive's the journey at sea and makes it to Louisiana, he'll uncover more pieces of the document, which will form the Louisiana Treaty. Once he does this, he's an American citizen. Game ends with him participating in a Mardi Gras parade, where he throws his beads away to the crowd and gets crowned.

Taylor Energy Alternatives is seeking first round investors for a micro hydroelectric power project and water remediation installation on an acid mine drain located in Luzerne County (Butler Township), Pennsylvania. Our second goal will be to treat this contaminated water to make it habitable for fish and wildlife and improve overall water quality in the downstream watershed.   	 This project consists of six major components:  • Water inlet  • Penstock  • Powerhouse  • Five hydro turbines  • Electrical components and wire to customer  • Water treatment facility    The project will generate an average of 1,987,200 kWh/yr at a retail price of $0.10 per kWh. Global Water Technologies is developing "smart water" solutions to reduce the amount of drinking water lost by utilities through aging infrastructure, leaking pipes and hundreds of daily water main breaks.

This significant problem not only wastes the precious drinking water, but also causes public health and safety issues, disruption of other business activities due to water loss and closed roads and results in poor customer service.

Smart water tools include sensors + software that measure water distribution and identify hidden and growing leaks before water mains fail. Smart meter upgrades allow real-time monitoring of usage patterns and our SaaS platform engages customers with better data and provides incentives for greater water efficiency.

Increasing water scarcity and higher prices means utilities need to reduce water loss, improve customer service and develop sustainable practices — new water technologies to improve drinking water distribution can help that business case.

Summary: MedScores-as-a-Service (MSaas) are the ultimate cloud-administered bad debt busters for doctors and hospitals.   	Problem: Did you know that underinsured Americans default on 60% of their healthcare bills?  Doctors and hospitals do.  In fact, these parties write off $80Bn ($350K on a per practice basis) in bad debt associated with the “self-pay” portion of health care bills each year! Said another way, bad debt for these groups = 15% of revenue!  myMedScore drops that by 1/3, or 100K!   	 Root cause: The reimbursement model of US healthcare. “Which part of the bill is mine???”  Accelerant: The Affordable Care Act, which will triple High Deductible Health Plans by 2020.                         “I’m insured. Treat me. Thanks, I’m better… what’s a deductible?”   	Solution: A trust-based, big data driven compliance score (a MedScore) and institutionalized payment protocols that ensure patients get served, each time, regardless of circumstance and doctors get paid, in-full, upfront.

We’re on a mission, folks. We’d call it a crusade, only those had a dress code (armor and chain mail have their place, but it’s awful hard to dance in ‘em) and a lot more blood. But our master plan, our blue-sky goal, is all-encompassing: Make A Cappella Better. For you, for your group, for the whole damn industry.

Wait, what?

See, each and every one of us at The Vocal Company and its extended family has a personal vested interest in a cappella. Sure, we’re a business, and yes, businesses do in fact charge for services (though we’ve got some FREE offerings too!). But that’s a by-product, not the reason – because it isn’t a day job – it’s what we were born to do. Put it this way: If we couldn’t “do a cappella,” we’d just stand around with a group of talented singers, harmonizing and beatboxing our favorite tunes. Dig?

The HEVO Power Network (HPN) consists of the HEVO Power Station (HPS), which is mounted to the pavement or embedded like a manhole cover to deliver up to 10kW of power. Installed along the chassis of the vehicle, the driver can visually align the HEVO Vehicle Receiver (HVR) with the HPS via the HEVO Mobile App. Once optimally aligned, the HVR and HPS form a “handshake” that initiates the process of wireless power transfer. The HEVO Mobile App (HMA) and Cloud Services provide fleet managers the ability to remotely manage their fleets, and access performance data and vehicle alignment tools.

With the HMA, fleet managers or drivers can easily adjust settings, like charging rates and duration on the fly with the swipe of a finger on a mobile device. Our cloud-based solution provides the driver or fleet manager with statistical charging data to correct inefficiencies in their EV usage and wireless charging ecosystem.

How does one effectively communicate with a large number of strangers in close proximity?  It could be the 'Annual Balloon Festival' in your locality, a conference, local emergency, an event at a stadium or your college campus. Of course you could use noisy megaphones, crowded information booths or resort to Twitter (for which you are back to the problem definition, how do you disseminate which twitter feed to subscribe to?). Enter SwarmLocal.   	 SwarmLocal lets you build localized messaging HotSpots (a.k.a swarms). The swarms you create or subscribe to have range limits, only users within the range can subscribe. Best of all, the swarm you create can be mobile, it moves with the Host who created it. Swarms disappear when user membership drops to zero. Also users automatically lose membership in the swarm when they move out of range.   	 Information stays local and users anonymous. Like a radio station, you tune in and tune out when out of range or flip to a different channel.

CSRware delivers compliance driven software analytics for Conflict Minerals Management and Sustainability Accounting using the Sustainability Accounting Standards Board (SASB standards) eliminating the use of spreadsheets and resources required to manually track, measure and report to the SEC.   

The CSRware software tracks, measures & predicts natural resource costs and risk  using scientific algorithms to address “Environmental Credentials” with analytics to unveil hidden efficiencies, cost reductions, and mitigate risk.

The SEC requires companies to report conflict minerals activities as stated in the Dodd-Frank Act.  In addition, The SEC will be enforcing material reporting using the SASB standards for key industries such as financial services, high technology, healthcare, and retail.  Public companies will need to file 10-K and 20-F's with accurate material usage.

To date, 75% of Fortune 500 sustainability leaders report to the CEO/COO with Legal engaged with SEC filings.

In 2000, patients were responsible for 5% of the total medical bill (mostly in the form of defined and easy to collect copays). Today, they are now responsible for 30% (mostly in the form of difficult to determine high deductibles and co-insurances).

Unfortunately, provider organizations are ill equipped to deal with this fundamental shift in payment flow. As a result, they are experiencing an unprecedented growth in patient bad debt, now a $100B problem. Medlio is solving this problem by pushing patient collections to the front of the revenue cycle.

Medlio’s web-based application for providers accurately estimates the cost of patient encounters before they occur, so patient-responsible balances can be collected on the front-end of a visit, prior to service. The solution takes the three key pieces of data: The patient’s benefits data & status, the provider’s contracted rates with the payer, and the expected bundled CPT codes, and delivers the cost estimate for the visit at check-in.

An entirely new type and class of motor and generator (both linear and rotary). Utilizing entirely different methods of operation, these machines do not depend on the principles of switched magnetic reluctance, enabling efficiencies far beyond conventional motor/generator technologies. This technology does not require complex electronic controllers or mechanical commutation with virtually silent operation with little heat gain and losses. The first electric motor that accepts any source of electric power, DC, or AC power, single phase or three phase.The highest watt per torque ever established and thrives on low speed-high torque operation without overheating. Extreme reliability as a coil fault or short doesn't stop motor/generator operation, perfect for critical or safe shutdown loads. In regenerative service as in electric vehicles, instantly converts momentum directly into battery charging. Perfect for windpower, wavepower or other high torque-low speed machines.

Generous is a pay-what-you-want social e-commerce platform that allows products to be shared to customers across social networks, blogs or websites. Instead of a static price, sellers set a minimum price they are willing to accept for an item. Using the Generous slider, buyers select a price they think is fair, and if the price meets certain goals set by the seller, they receive special incentives.

To further encourage buyers to give a little more, a percentage of every sale always goes to a good cause. For each slider, sellers decide the amount that gets donated (1-100%), and where they want the donation to go.

Easily embed sliders anywhere you would a picture or video, or share them across social networks. Checkout takes place right within the slider keeping the experience completely seamless and simple.

Generous charges a simple 5% + 30¢ fee. We cover the cost of everything else. There are absolutely no additional fees, and no monthly charges.

At GoGoHealth, we’re creating on-demand, asynchronous health care delivery over the Internet.

Half of visits to primary doctor’s offices are for 40 common illnesses and conditions, such as shingles, pinkeye or infected ear.

These illnesses are not hard to diagnose or treat, but most people have to take time out of their day to see their caregivers. Many just skip going to their doctors, allowing these small illnesses to progress and sometimes become more serious and painful.

GoGoHealth has developed a platform that allows for safe, secure, and quick relief for these ailments.

Doctors determine how to treat illnesses, then dispense advice, a prescription, or -- if needed -- a request for an in-person examination.

The value to patients is clear: They get quick relief, get it from their own doctors wherever they are, and won’t skip seeking treatment.

The value to doctors is greater: They “see” more patients, don’t waste time on minor cases, and keep their patients happy and loyal.

It is evident that app stores are very limited when it comes to app discovery, so it is not rare to find that great apps are getting lost in the heap. App discovery has become a challenge for both, developers and users: developers want their content in the field of view of every potential customer, and users want their devices clutter-free, occupied only by those apps that are RELEVANT to them. 

Appetite+ is the solution. It integrates social and personalized elements into app-discovery to provide a meaningful discovery experience. By accessing data such as users' social graph, location, interests, groups, and friends' apps, we are able to help them find the right apps for their specific needs.

Fosmo Med Introduced Maji™, a Forward Osmosis (FO) based field hydration solution for intravenously use (IV), to be created using any water at the point of care. The IV bags are shipped sans water, thus: reduce the shipping cost up to 75% or more; increase the product shelf life; reduce storage costs; and, reduces the risk of scrap due to leakage. For a product that costs less than a $1 to produce, often the logistical cost of shipping can be up to 10x the product cost in the US and multiple of that overseas. 

That's one of primary reasons why US with 370 million people consume 51% of the overall products, while places like Asia with over 4.2 billion people uses less than 12% of the total consumption. Because of the difficulty in shipping this critical life saving devices, often people will die from dehydration related diseases like Cholera.

We have conducted tests at labs to prove the technology works. We have strong patents applied in 2013. We have clear paths defined for FDA/CE.

RentSpek is a free app that offers users a less invasive home inspection, allowing renters to grade a property. ShopInPower has straightforward functionality and is easy to navigate for users.  The technical requirements to use the app are simply a smartphone with a camera. The way it works is that when one shops alone, he/she can receive suggestions in real time from other app users in order to make a better decision. For example, if  an app user goes clothes shopping and does not know if she should buy a dress, she can take a picture of her wearing the dress and upload it on ShopInPower. Other app users can view the picture and click the “like” button if they like it or “unlike” if not. They can also leave comments. If the girl ultimately chooses to buy the dress, a proportion of people who clicked “like” will receive “spoints”, which is a currency in ShopInPower. If she decides not to buy, a proportion of people who clicked “unlike” can also receive”spoints”. By accumulating spoints, app users can get  brand discounts for their future purchases.

Harmon International Petroleum has contracted to acquire a major California oil play with excellent risk-adjusted upside potential.   We have secured an LOI to list the company on the Toronto Venture Exchange through a reverse merger.  We plan on acquiring additional oil and gas assets in the Western U.S.

The transaction is a 24-well drilling project in Ventura County, on the Eastern edge of the 10th largest oil field in California. We have obtained an independent reserve evaluation form a large and well respected petroleum engineering company located in Houston. The report categorizes the proved reserves at between 3.9 and 4.8 million barrels of oil (MMBO). This is based on drilling 13-16 new wells. Total reserves of all categories are 8 to 10 MMBO. The net present value (discounted at 10% p.a.), after return of capital, is $6.0 million per well for the proved case (i.e., no fracking) and $11.0 million per well for the base case (i.e, with a four-stage frack). IRR's exceed 40%.

Our initial focus at SchedEx will be in the call center industry, both inbound and outbound. Workforce management applications typically will forecast incoming call volume and handle time, and allow the end user to enter in a value for the expected shrinkage on the floor. Through a series of mathematical equations, the applications will then generate a “Required Hours” number. This number is the basis of how the Scheduling portions of these applications work.  SchedEx takes all the factors mentioned above and adds a never before seen capability to the workforce managers’ arsenal. It gives the scheduler the ability to forecast shrinkage based on actual data, combined with an accurate forecasting methodology for volume and handle times. The scheduling algorithm of SchedEx will produce revolutionary accuracy for service levels; not only for a daily total, but at the interval level as well.

Plasmacat technology lowers fuel consumption and exhaust emissions for fuel oil powered vehicles, engines, furnaces, boilers, incinerators, fuel-injected combustion equipment of any size, installed as a retrofit or in new designs. Plasmacat is a complete emissions control system for cleaning diesel exhaust and a breakthrough technology for reducing fuel consumption. The plasma actuated electronic catalytic converter is an adaptive emissions control technology that self-adjusts to diesel exhaust and is installed as a standard muffler found on most vehicles. The same technology also reduces fuel consumption for fuel-oil all fuel-oil burners and diesel engines, and will find use in chemical manufacture and refinery. Electronic control of chemical catalysis will shift a 30+ billion dollar industry from chemical product manufacture to electronic technology. Plasmacat will be the only US company ready for that transition because, we invented it.

Flotation therapy is therapy that is undertaken by floating in a warm salt water in a float tank.  The tank is a little larger around than a twin sized bed and chest high. It contains 10" of water to which 800lbs of epsom salt has been added, that when you get in and lie on your back, you are pushed to the surface so you float like a cork, weightless as an astronaut in space. There is a lightweight door that you can leave open, or if you want to get rid of the distractions of noise and light you can close the door. By suspending in weightlessness and suppressing the senses, the client can reach an ultra relaxing and meditative state, which can lead to many psychological and physiological benefits. Studies has shown positive outcomes in one's quality of life. Clients who suffer from stress related illnesses can benefit from a therapy that can not only provide quality relaxation from stress, but experience a meditative moment that can influence a revived awareness.

Extremal Film Partners offers film makers a guaranteed box office revenue for their films. Its contract clears on box office revenues and is completely transparent to investors. Producers can obtain distribution under the Extremal contract because they are guaranteed a minimum box office revenue. We follow a rigorous statistical modeling procedure that treats each film as a unique prospect --- distribution of probabilities and outcomes. Extremal purchases the swaps it writes for the Extremal Film Fund, which is planned to have $150 million in initial funding. The first graphic above shows the probability distribution of outcomes of a 100-film fund. The mean of this distribution is $591 million, including the initial seed of $150 million. The 10-th, 25-th, 50-th, 75-th, and 90-th quantiles are $431M, $505M, $589M, $675M, and $756M. The second graphic shows the stochastic evolution of 1000 100-film funds.

We are expanding to include a daycare facility designed for children with special needs (i.e., autism) from birth to five years of age.  When children with autism are in a traditional daycare setting they may be physically cared for, but often they are not taught because the staff are not trained in special education.  Many of the children may be referred out of the program because of high behaviors and disruptions.  As a result many working parents get called away from work or have to quit their jobs in order to care for their children. Research shows that children who have autism should receive 40 hours of therapy a week.  Many programs through the state and school districts for this early developmental age range offer a small fraction of the intensive therapy that is recommended. The incidence of autism has increased from 1 in 150 in 2000 to 1 in 88 in 2008, so there is a need to provide these individuals with affordable, intensive, therapeutic services.

Targeted nanoparticle tumor ablation medical devices for diagnostics and therapy.   	Multi-walled Carbon Nanotubes (MWCNT) are designed with internal antennae tuned to a specific Near Infrared (NIR) laser frequency, which, when activated, oscillate at high speeds, generating thermal energy (heat) sufficient to cause cell apoptosis.  Using targeting probes, the MWCNT seek out, attach to, and reside within, specific cancer cells the targeting probes are engineered to recognize.  The NIR laser is non-invasive, and does not injure the skin.  In addition to the ability to seek out and destroy cancer, the MWCNT can also be conjugated with probes for high resolution imaging for diagnostics purposes using existing MRI technology.

PlenSat is a preclinical stage biomedical device venture pursuing its patented technology for the treatment of obesity.  PlenSat ‘Digestible Balloons™” are a unique approach which may achieve the benefits of Bariatric therapy to treat obesity without invasive techniques such as surgery, laparoscopy or endoscopy. Digestible Balloons promise the simplicity of pharmaceutical dosage with the weight loss profile of Bariatric therapy. PlenSat’s technology involves the production of ingestible ‘pills’ that are self-inflating in the acidic environment within the stomach. The expanded capsule, a “Digestible Balloon”, is sized such that once inflated it will not pass beyond the stomach. Preclinical pilot studies in dogs have shown that the capsules do inflate to the appropriate size to remain in the stomach for an extended time. The Digestible Balloon is ultimately broken down in the stomach over time and residual material is digested in the intestine and passed.

Wing Ma’am is the mobile app that aims to unite LGBT women. The app safely connects women with other women while informing them of related events in their area. Wing Ma’am is more than just a dating app; it encourages users to participate in and create their own events.

Four to seven percent of the world's population identifies as LGB or T. Our available market size in the us is 9.4 million women. Worldwide, it is 29.9 million women. 
	
There is no platform where lesbians can safely connect or be “in the know” of LGBT friendly events and establishments. As a result, many young lesbians feel isolated, unable to express their identity without fear of reprisal or judgment. We learned more about these challenges through a survey we administered to 2,500 women.

Wing Ma'am will help increase the visibility of the thriving LGBT community and will provide one centralized place to browse profiles, chat with like-minded individuals, share information, and create and RSVP to events.

Artizens is an online multiplayer video game for PC, Mac, and Linux. It has three core features that set it apart from other games:   	- Workshop: Players can draw their own characters by making each piece of equipment. Skywall is a mobile application enabling people to communicate freely among their friends thanks to anonymity.   	 On today’s existing social networks, a lot of people are reluctant to post anything by fear of being judged by their network. For this reason, a high proportion of our Facebook friends choose to remain passive, while those that are active tend to show off. In any case, interactions are often overplayed.   	 On Skywall, people experience true freedom of speech among their friends thanks to anonymity. They can say or share anything on their wall (pictures, thoughts, opinions, jokes…) that they would never dare saying on any other social networks. No need to think "politically correct" anymore, no more fear of being judged. It's not about who you are, it's about what you post.

Let’s face it we live in a digital world where files, photos and documents are shared daily. For businesses needing to grow and expand this is a major security concern as sensitive files and emails move in and out of their infrastructure daily.   	  FileLife addresses these security vulnerabilities by giving businesses and organizations the ability to not only encrypt their data, but continuously control the data after it has left their possession.   	  With FileLife Businesses can track where, when and who their data is being accessed. If a file or email was shared by mistake, it can be instantly ‘killed’ ensuring it is not accessed.   	  FileLife’s technology is designed to protect data throughout its lifecycle for healthcare, legal and financial organizations needing to meeting strict regulatory compliances like SOX, GBL, PCI and HIPAA.

OmniBazaar is an explicitly "white-market" peer-to-peer marketplace with built-in safeguards to deter and remove listings for illegal products or services. It is a marketplace "of the people, by the people, for the people" that eliminates the "middlemen" and "bankers" from e-commerce transactions.

Users buy and sell directly among themselves (rather than through a middleman site like Amazon or eBay), using Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies (instead of credit cards or PayPal). By using a distributed structure to eliminate the middlemen, and Bitcoin to eliminate the bankers, OmniBazaar charges users 80% lower fees than existing e-commerce sites like eBay, Alibaba and Amazon. Built-in incentives reward providers of essential services, as a way of avoiding the "tragedy of the commons" scenario. 

OmniBazaar will also serve the 2.5 billion "un-banked" people world-wide who cannot use existing e-commerce sites, because those sites require users to have credit cards and bank accounts.

Hypecal is the Event Hub: http://hypecal.com

Hypecal gather all kind of events published on the web to make them easy to find in a mobile app.
The product: Margaret, an event search engine, a customizable secretary app that learns from your tastes and tells you if something around you is made for you. 
Margaret is the Foursquare for events + AI algorith.

Events are very complex they are composed of independent factors such as date, place, price, people and categories that make them hard to promote.
Hypecal is at the initiative of ESS: http://essfeed.org, an open-source XML feed standard dedicated to describe events.
ESS is a standard that unified the way events are published on the web to broadcast them easily. More than 10,000 providers use ESS, we work with event software editors to make it wildly used.
Hypecal.com aggregates and validate those feeds in real-time.

Problem / Solution

For those that have built a modern application you know connecting to each service’s API is a big pain and centralized services such as Singly aren't cutting it.

The Problem / Pain Points:
1. Singly acts as a single source for accessing these API's so there isn't any price competition.
2. Singly is a private centralized company, and so if it doesn't support the API you want, the developer is out of luck.
3. Since its not open source the developer can't see the back end of how Singly’s code is handling the data.

The Solution:
1. A marketplace where API providers compete on price with easy digital payments.
2. An open standard so anyone can add additional APIs.
3. An open source view into how all the data is handled so that developers can customize it for your application if you need a more powerful solution.

The problem:  Conventional insulation for opaque walls and roofs resists heat transfer by conduction only but not by infrared radiation (IR).  The magnitude of the problem is exemplified by the fact that IR gains and losses account for 65+% of the 1/3 of all electricity produced in the U.S. currently consumed by Heating, Ventilating and Air Conditioning of buildings (HVAC).   	 The solution:  Soleil’s three patent pending Insulation technologies, which can prevent up to 99+% of IR heat transfer, achieve: 1) the insertion of sealed recessed IR barriers within insulations; (2) the insertion of micro and nano ceramic and metal particles within insulation foams; and (3) insulations that harvest and shed heat. Collectively these three can do substantially more for exterior building surfaces than Low-Emissive (Low-E) technology does for glazing.  Soleil saves 50% to 80% of the costs for HVAC design, equipment, configuration, installation, maintenance and operational energy consumption.

Introducing the Series Panel Cooling Module,or SPCM., our patented thermoelectric/photovoltaic hybrid electrical production system.  The SPCM uses light and heat from the sun to produce electrity.   	The SPCM can be configured to produce DC electrical voltage (same as a solar panel) or can produce AC voltage (same as a solar panel with inverter).  The SPCM is excellent for built-in recharging applications.  Our generation 1 SPCM is configured to be used similar to a solar panel as a power supply.   	Why a solar~thermoelectric hybrid? Because even with solar panel efficiencies on the climb, a combined thermoelectric/photovoltaic hybrid is the best solution...and only becoming better as efficiencies improve.   	Our first edition SPCM produces 10 amps of electricity from the surface area of a 10 watt solar panel, while at the same time is configured to maintain a lower solar panel / cell surface temperature and is configurable for built-in charging applications.

Aircard is an app for iOS and Android to make contact exchange easier, revokable, and asychronous. Contact exchange is cumbersome and interrupts the flow of conversation among friends and acquaintances. Aircard streamlines this process by making it asynchronous. When you're with friends and want to get their contact info, instead of initiating a conversation asking them for it, you can open Aircard, find them using Bluetooth and GPS, and swipe your customized Card to them with all the information you want them to have. They'll get a notification of your Card, send you their Card, and you're done. No awkward conversation, no fumbling around on the keypad getting every digit right. It's simple. The average American family spends over $600 on food every month (Gallup, 2012). In fact, groceries are the largest monthly expenses for a family after rent or mortgage. How can a family save money on their groceries in an easy and simple way? This is where SharpCart’s solution comes into play. Our website provides families with the ability to find and compare prices and coupons for their local grocery stores based on an easy to use virtual shopping list. All that is required from a user is to log in, add grocery items to the virtual shopping list, and, click the “Optimize” button. At this point, our algorithms and databases will scan all relevant local grocery stores for their prices and weekly deals, provide the user with detailed price comparisons, and suggest the best store to purchase it. Families using SharpCart have been able to save on average 20% off their groceries by using it to find the most affordable local store for their shopping lists.

Kibitz is an iOS app that will let anyone run their own small scale creativity contest. For the first time, people will have a way to gather in-the-moment, creative responses from actual people.

Rapfeatures.com is the “Ebay” for hip hop related features, verses and song collaborations.

The idea is to create a global market place; a mix between Elance, Fiverr and Ebay,  where music artists can buy and sell “features” online in a secure environment.

What is a “feature”?

A feature is a guest appearance of a musical artist on the song of another artist.  The feature can be part of the verse in the song or in the chorus section of the song.  A feature can also be part of the instrumental.

Examples:

Run DMC feat. Aerosmith "Walk This Way"
Michael Jackson feat. Eddie Van Halen "Beat It"
Taylor Swift feat. T-pain Tthug Story”  


Traditionally the exchange of a hip hop/rap verse for money has occurred between record labels through contracts. However the underground market, that comprises of most of the hip hop industry, operates solely on trust and an unregulated code of conduct between artists. Rapfeatures plans to capture this market by providing a trusted online platform.

Sabreez is a Green Button App that shows you how much wind power you use.  We integrate Smart Meter data with Wind Power production data from the California ISO using your utility's Green Button Connect feature.

What's your Wind Number?  Your Wind Number is the proportion of your power that comes from Clean Wind Power instead of Dirty Fossil Fuel Burning Power Plants.  Every smart meter in California has a Wind Number, and the higher your Wind Number, the more clean energy you use- and the more you can save using a Time of Use rate tariff.    

Residential Demand Response is the Holy Grail of monetizing Users energy data.  The prototype App is working at www.windnumber.com and a provisional patent application has been filed with the USPTO.  The Facebook Social Game is being developed for the Spring.  Sabreez allows users to buy more of something good that saves money.  As web-enabled devices proliferate, Sabreez will run them while you sleep using Clean Wind Power that costs less.

The Business is a revolutionary concept combining non-profit work with a franchise opportunity. Every vehicle donated in the US is wholesaled to the auto industry at a fraction of the Market Value, this is mainly due to the many middlemen involved in the transaction; resulting in Donors and Charities only receiving a fraction of the true value. Charity Auto Club is the first Charity developed from the ground floor to take donated vehicles and give them away 100% free to people in need. This allows the donor to deduct the full market value of the vehicle because Charity Auto Club's process is the only one that uses the full value for a charitable cause. The profit and franchise possibilities are through the accompanying used car dealerships of every charity location. The vehicles in too poor of condition to repair are parted out and the excess of vehicles donated will be sold to individuals unable to qualify for low income supplement. Envision a combination of Carmax and The Red Cross.

It is our goal to help curb the effect from forming a stronghold in those affected by abuse and violence. We are currently doing this by offering services to abuse shelters for makeovers and gently donated clothing. Other services to these people will be workshops in boosting their self esteem and getting them ready to reenter the world with a higher confidence level.   Esteem by definition means “to regard highly or favorably; regard with respect or admiration.”

EduPal stems from the need to establish a universal all-in-one education tool for students and parents. With EduPal, we expect to aid in some of the most pressing issues in student education such as time management, access to financial aid, and transparency. EduPal is set to launch on August 11th, 2014 at 12:01am and will be available as a web application. The primary function of our application (at launch date) is to virtualize the course syllabus and integrate the content with existing calendar applications. The content that will be synced includes office hours, class times, homework due dates, assessment dates, project due dates, and events. A student using EduPal will be able to see their entire academic life on their Google, Apple, or Microsoft Calendar. Students can track one course free and upgrade to track more classes. Our low cost and simple solution will serve as the ultimate study and time management tool for more than 50 million students in the U.S.

SYNOPSIS:  Russian Red #7 is a seductive, breathtaking story that’s sexy and yet jagged, lush and yet spare – it draws you into the life of Luo-yi, a beautiful, self-destructive woman waiting for death and running from love, caught between her dark past in Beijing and her life as a model in Paris.  Through this fierce young artist, haunted by a hidden death sentence, we discover an ugly chapter in China’s recent history, in which the government inadvertently infected perhaps a million individuals with HIV.   The film blurs the line between the scars we hide and the tattoos we wear with pride.   AUDIENCE:  The film targets 18-48 year olds worldwide with an emphasis in Europe and Asia.  Viewers include those interested in French and Chinese culture, the multinational experience, and social justice.   It will be distributed worldwide with an emphasis in TV, DVD/VOD distribution, and limited theatrical release.

Pikit, though currently a game, is being built into a gamified photo sharing platform that enables users to create collages of four photos, called Pikits; These Pikits are used to describe a word that the user decides.  Users can share these Pikits with friends, and follow friends, celebrities, and expert Pikit users to get updates when Pikits are posted.  Followers use these Pikits to guess the word they are meant to describe by unscrambling letters.  A correct guess results in a ? which acts as a “like”.  Some classic game mechanics are included which create instant monetization and aid users in guessing Pikits.  These Pikits get categorized based on the word they are associated with to act as a built in hashtag.  This allows for simple display of trending topics.   In addition to posting Pikits publicly, users can send private Pikits directly to other users to engage in a private, back and forth game.  We expect to continue to grow the game and gradually introduce platform features.

This product helps customers track tires and their usage autonomously.  The focus, for now, is primarily on companies that employ semi-tractor trailer configurations.  Currently, it is very difficult to track the actual usage of tires ($/mile). Companies know they need tires, but cannot effectively quantify, thus reconcile, the usage of the tires. Companies do not have a very good handle of where any given tire is located, how many miles are on the tire, and how long a tire has been in service. By using patent pending technologies/methodologies, this system provides the ability to track the tire from its incorporation into a customer's facility to the tire's expiration. A company will be able to determine where any given tire is located, how long it has been in service, and what the tire usage is. Management will have the ability to predict tire purchases using trend analysis beyond. Additionally, this system can assist in the reduction of lost or stolen tires.

NanoMed Targeting Systems Inc. (NanoMed) is developing a market disruptive drug delivery system using magnetic targeting technology to revolutionize the drug delivery. 
Our first application is a new treatment for atrial fibrillation - the most common cardiac arrhythmia disease, affecting over 2.6 million Americans, with more than 160,000 new cases each year. It is caused by abnormal nerve activity in the heart and characterized by a very fast, chaotic rhythm in the atria. In the U.S., AF causes more than 70,000 strokes each year. As the population ages, the prevalence of atrial fibrillation is expected to grow significantly, impacting up to 13 million in the US by 2050. The current leading procedure - RF ablation - is limited success rate (~50%), it is risky, long and costly. Also, since only electrophysiologists can perform it, there will not be enough physician to perform all needed procedures. 
NTS procedure is  safer, shorter, less costly and can be performed by any cardiologist.

RESIDENTIAL INCOME ARBITRAGE

Adagio ABL, LLC (the “Fund”) is a residential income real estate fund focused on meeting the demand for non-recourse bridge financing in the investor market and is managed by Adagio, LLC (the “Manager”). The Fund utilizes low-LTV mortgages in conjunction with various lease and option structures designed to generate an internal hedge against residential real estate market volatility via arbitrage.

The Manager views residential real estate value as a function of its net rental income as opposed to the popular comparable sales model. Historically, while comparable sales values have experienced significant volatility, Owner Equivalent Rents (“OER”), as tracked by the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (“BLS”), have been relatively stable. Constructing arbitrage trades between income-based and comparable sales valuations has insulated the Manager’s portfolio from systemic risk, such as the crisis of 2008, while increasing overall returns.

Our Bluetooth context based technology uses a proprietary Beaconing technology that adds life to any location:  a home for sale, a restaurant or retail establishment. The Connector platform allows doctors, hospitals, labs, etc., to communicate and collaborate in a better way.  The connector solves the interoperability problem in healthcare that prevents doctors from seamlessly sharing patient clinical and demographic information.  The Connector platform allows doctors to do things like automatically reconcile medications, detect "co-morbidities", download a patient record from all the doctors that patient sees or has seen and import a referral straight into their system without typing, scanning or faxing.  For patients the Connector enables paperless check in at your doctors’ office as well as getting notices to your mobile devise when your patient record changes at any of your doctors’ offices.

Floatation Tanks (also known as Isolation Tanks or Sensory Deprivation Tanks) are designed to create a condition which is ideal for the relaxation and rejuvenation of the Mind/Body. Research shows that the effects of a float session are equivalent to eight hours of deep sleep, making it one of the most efficient and comprehensive relaxation techniques available. A Floatation Tank is an enclosed structure which diminishes light and sound. Each tank holds 10 inches of water with 800 lbs. of dissolved Epsom Salts, which enable a person to float effortlessly. The water is heated to an average skin temperature (93.5F) which reduces the sensation between body and water. The tanks are fully ventilated and the water/salt solution is sterilized after each use using a combined system of ozone, concentrated hydrogen peroxide and diatomite earth filters.

Teraphysics Corporation develops devices that operate in the terahertz frequency, the last commercially untapped portion of the electro-magnetic spectrum (all previously commercialized spectrums of the electro-magnetic have created trillion dollar industries). Riding Daily is a 3 day bicycle riding adventure that begins Friday evening and concludes Sunday afternoon. Riding Daily is intended for cyclists comfortable with riding at a relaxed pace, 15-20 mph, for long durations. Typical rides are 2-3 hours Friday, 4-6 hours Saturday, and 4-6 hours Sunday. The gift card industry has annual sales of over $100 billion in the U.S.  Some estimates are that as much as $20 billion dollars per year in gift cards is either lost, stolen, or goes unused.  Gift Card Combo aims to close that gap by providing services that allow consumers to store all of their gift card information in one place and to track the value of their cards.   	Gift Card Combo will develop a mobile application to link those gift cards to a financial account and a payment card, such as a debit card or a credit card.  When a consumer uses his payment card, Gift Card Combo determines if the consumer has a gift card with that merchant.  If a valid gift card is on file, Gift Card Combo applies the value of the gift card before applying the funds in the account.   	Gift Card Combo will be very attractive for our partners, such as banks and telephone companies because Gift Card Combo will charge a fee for this service and split it with our partners.  Also, since a payment card is required, it encourages young people to obtain bank accounts, which provides more incentive for banks to partner with Gift Card Combo. Gift Card Combo has filed U.S Patent Application No. 13/656,848 on the method and system for performing these services.   	Gift Card Combo also intends to sell and resell gift cards to the public.  Gift Card Combo will facilitate the exchange of privately owned gift cards between people who want to sell and purchase existing gift cards and will take a commission for doing so.   	Finally, Gift Card Combo will provide a digital wallet service to its customers.  Digital wallets digitize all of the cards and items in the customer’s wallet and is more secure because it requires a password for access.  Digital wallet applications and services are gaining a foothold in the market and are experiencing massive growth due to the large number of mobile devices. Digital wallets will be provided to individuals, families, and corporations at different rates.

OfferJar is a simple, automated plug-in that allows buyers and sellers to bargain in real time to capture close more deals.  No need to wait for sales, coupons or discounts. 

Approved by eBay. Patent pending. 

Lately, at the request of merchants, Amazon  has introduced "Make an Offer service. We automate that service.  We did that for eBay. 
Buyers and Sellers are prevented from closing large number of transactions because they are not able to negotiate with each other in real time. 

When a seller offers a product above what the buyer is willing to pay a sale is lost, when the price is too low a margin is lost. A tool is needed that will allow buyer and seller to negotiate and achieve an equitable price. OfferJar provides that tool.  

There is no other application available which provides this service.  

OfferJar is an innovative and new automated negotiations platform. By using a proprietary 2-way bidding algorithm, OfferJar aims to bring online retail to a new level of collaborative deal-making.

Current online retailers suffer from gaps in product pricing and buyer willingness to pay. There is a lack of information that allows sellers to appropriately determine the best price to offer each individual consumer, as such, many sales are left on the table.

Under all available applications there is a delay of hours, sometimes days to get a response to buyers’ offers. Because of that, very often the buyer completes the transaction at another venue. 

If it doesn’t work fast you into the next thing.  


OfferJar allows sellers to upload any and all unsold items and uses a seller directed toughness scale to offer negotiated discounts to buyers.  This allows the seller, at no cost in labor once it is set on auto-pilot, to achieve a sale that would otherwise not have occurred, and turn inventory over faster. 

 For more details see links to Investor Deck and Product Offering.

We promote energy efficiency by offering innovative products, resource-efficient planning and services guaranteed to counteract skyrocketing energy costs. Central to our business is the delivery of performance and savings guarantees through our energy performance contracts (EPCs). ex24 WAS PREVIOUSLY REGISTERED WITH THE U.S. SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION(SEC).
ex24 PROPOSES TO USE THIS FUNDING TO RE-REGISTER WITH THE SEC

ex24, with its  technology platform written in Java , managed by  its majority shareholder as CEO,   previously operated as a Person to Person, 24/7,   broker-less, major stock trading and settlement system. 
ex24 was  an SEC registered Alternative Trading System(ATS), operating as a  Self Clearing  Broker/ Dealer.  Because of a rule,  limiting trades to 99 shares per order, from which ex24 unsuccessfully sought exemption,  the system was shuttered as unprofitable in 2006 after a cash investment of more than $9 million by its Founder, James P. Lennane. 
ex24 traded solely in large cap Listed Securities. It closed its operation with a flawless record.
Mr. Lennane now proposes to become the U.S. premier, SEC registered, Title III Crowdfunding issue support system, a Title III Crowdfunding  trading platform, a transaction settlement  system, and a stock holder record management system. Initially,  ex24 will conduct Funding Portal activities. However, after proving its core system, ex24'a long range goal is provide a full service initiation and initial funding services  to SEC Registered Broker/Dealers Funding Portals and Title III Crowdfunding Issuers thus relieving them  of the detailed burdens of an SEC Regulatory compliance for Crowdfunding by an Issuer. Further ex24 will perform the stock records maintenance and transfer services to Issuers once the Issuer's Crowdfunding is completed. Subsequent to Title III Issues having passed through the mandatory one year holding period, ex24 will provide a complete trading platform for buying, selling and selling the previously issued Title III securities in a safe and secure already proven environment..
ex24 will use the proceeds of the offering to apply to  be registered with the SEC as a Self Clear Broker/ Dealer that  will be permitted to carry Customer funds and Securities.

The Intergovernmental Marine Bioenergy and Carbon Sequestration Protocol:
Environmental and Political Risk Reduction of Global Carbon Management
The IMBECS Protocol Draft
                                                                                                                               
Abstract: The IMBECS Protocol concept employs large cultivation and biorefinery installations, within the five Subtropical Convergence Zones (STCZs), to support the production of commodities such as carbon negative biofuels, seafood, organic fertilizer, polymers and freshwater, as a flexible and cost effective means of Global Warming Mitigation  (GWM) governance with the primary objective being the global scale replacement of fossil fuels (FF). This governance approach is categorically distinct from all other large scale GWM governance concepts, yet many of the current marine related GWM technologies  are adaptable to this governance proposal.

BetterTrainers is an invite-only online booking site for fitness professional in major metropolitan areas. Its service caters to those that are looking for a proven personal trainer and takes the hassle out of trying to vet over 1,000 trainers in each city.

Solafeet, Inc. is a Florida corporation created after four years of product development. The company’s Solafeet ST-400 tanning bed for the feet is a patented design that eliminates the white feet/sock line tan associated with playing sports in the sun. It is being marketed to golfers, tennis players, runners, bicyclists, walkers, and all others who seek to solve the problem of their untanned feet. Utilizing four (4) powerful Wolff Systems tanning bulbs, the Solafeet unit will safely produce a natural tan with only 15 minutes of usage per day: while on the computer, watching TV, or just sitting in a chair. It’s ideal for golfers or tennis players who continue to tan their legs but not their feet while playing several times per week. In a spot survey in the Sarasota, Fl market covering  328 women golfers at 5 separate private country clubs, 322 (98%) complained of white feet. Many also indicated that their male companion had the same problem. With over 1.05 million women golfers at private country clubs and over 26.1 million total golfers in the U.S. alone, a large niche market is available. Adding together tennis (+25 MM), running (+11.5 MM), bicycling (+22MM), and walkers creates a sizable domestic market. Internationally, this market doubles in size. Solafeet will be a financial success if  >0.1% of the women golfers market segment is captured. Over 850 Solafeet units have been sold online at: www.solafeet.com. A random survey of purchasers had a 30% response rate, and every response indicated that they would recommend the product to a friend.
The units are manufactured in an ISO 9002 rated facility in Largo, Fl that meets all UL/FDA standards and is capable of producing 2500 units/week.  
The marketing strategy is to drive sales directly to the website instead of relying on distributors,  preserving the existing 105% markup over cost. An equity investment of $500K is being sought to proceed with the advertising strategy.

Quivers was formed in early 2012 by 3 founders who wanted a better way to purchase authentic products online directly from the brand. With most brands, it was not possible to buy direct through their websites and this was generally a result of their ability to still support and promote their existing retail base. Some brands use a "dealer locator" or a much higher price on their website as a solution which are not effective answers. With the founders having a history and background as brand manufacturers, they knew the problems and challenges dealing with online channel conflict. The Quivers team set out to create a solution that partners the brands and their retailers online; instead of competing against each other, the brand can now support their retailers. The result is a robust toolset that allows the brand to control the way they want to do business online while still ensuring the retailers are supported.

It produces a sophisticated package for consultants and accountants to enable them to use the company's proprietary audit technology and associated support services to conduct in depth, surgical diagnostic evaluations of companies' operations, financials and structure to determine where companies are out of balance and sluggish. The original version like the ones  in development, is process driven, standardized and dissects a company into 50 Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), with each being scientifically analyzed for its contribution to EBITDA erosion and then ranks, by a sophisticated algorithm, from high to low the worst to the least problem areas. All inputs done online and report auto generated. There are an additional 9 versions in development. 
The company's SaaS target market is large, consisting of business consultants, accountants and similar type of professionals who work with companies dealing with their financials and operations.  Likewise, the Business Advisors who are licensed through the model, have a larger market which is all companies, all governmental agencies and all not for profit organizations.   The company also licenses the AVD to large private companies and consulting firms.

TimberFish Technologies (TFT) is an LLC that intends to license and sell a comprehensive environmental biotechnology for seafood production to the global aquaculture industry.   	TFT is industry changing and will solve many of problems that are limiting seafood industry growth and profitability, including rising costs of energy, feeds, waste and wastewater treatment, competition for clean water supplies, and mounting evidence that contaminants brought into the systems with marine-based feeds represent serious health problems.   	TFT will generate billions of dollars of new revenues in an environmentally responsible way.  It is: •Local, minimizing transportation costs and carbon emissions, while enhancing product freshness •Contaminant free  •Uses no fishmeal or fish oils thus preserving declining oceanic fish populations  • Uses local bio-mass significantly incentivizing reforestation and deforestation avoidance •Environmentally restorative, no wastewater pollutants, no odors, all solids beneficially reused   	Our approach to the global seafood market is to license technology to leading industry partners.  Commercial development will leverage the expertise of established operators within the existing supply chain.  The existing market is complex and fragmented, and we anticipate developing multiple specific partners based on geography and market segment.   	We seek to raise approximately $400,000.  Based on income projections which will generate a return on investment over the first five years of commercial operation that exceeds twenty to one.    This is based on an objective of 24 operating facilities in the US by 2021, which we believe is achievable.  We estimate 2021 revenues of about $215 million/year to our licensees.  This level of production represents a modest penetration of approximately 1.5% of the US market and less than 0.1% of the global market.  We further believe equal results will be achievable in Europe and Asia during the same period.

Your Health, Our Mission - The year 2013 ushered in a new era highlighting the public’s interest around healthcare and personal control of healthcare choices.  Arguably, healthcare delivery, financing and education has been the most emotionally charged issue over the past year with the passage, and now the implementation of the Affordable Care Act creating a demand for primary  care services that far outpaces supply.  StepOne Personal Health’s mission is to deliver a better experience for consumers while easing the burden on an already taxed healthcare system. Our innovative model includes a single electronic destination for consumers trying to understand and make a positive impact on their health.  By using state of the art technology to deliver a more satisfying and proactive experience, while engaging individuals in the active participation of their health needs, our destination connects individuals to health products, services and experts with easy and convenient tools highly desired by the new generation of health consumers.   The tech-savvy  health consumer is continuously increasing their interest and engagement in improving health and optimizing their health, especially if dealing with chronic disease or trying to prevent it. There is also an increasing shift toward complementary, integrative and holistic approaches to health - as well as the historically traditional approaches to healthcare.  Under our innovated model, and with our powerful social messaging, our virtual health destination promotes traditional, functional and preventive medicine offerings in a HIPAA compliant, consumer centric, and easy-to-use environment.   The increasing need for technology and efficiency in the traditional system, along with consumer demand for access and service, creates the optimal environment for rapid growth of StepOne Personal Health’s platform and destination featuring our products, services and professional resources.

AppSpin is the ultimate tool box for tracking, analyzing and optimizing your organic traffic for your mobile app.   	The Problem: iTunes and Play store URLs don't provide App developers any insight or analytics into how they are performing in organic and social channels.   	The Solution: AppSpin provides a free URL shortening service for developers (think Bit.ly on mobile steriods) to help track those long iTunes and Play store links. They are platform agnostic, so they can detect what sort of device you are and send you to the appropriate store or website. We give them mobile-centric data points, such as device and platform breakdown per channel making it a no-brainer for app developers to use AppSpin.   	We use the data about how these links proliferate to help power our premium products with AppSpin links, such as strategic deeplinking, benchmark analytics and a out of the box incentivized user referral system.

This billing system will be paper less, easy to use, safe and secure. Although our system will encompass the entire automotive industry it will still maintain complete security and privacy for both venders as well as customers. It will not be possible for any vendor to see what other venders are selling to any customer. Each vendor and customer will have their own login code. The vendor will be able to view their sales records while customers can review their purchases, credits and payments.   	Using todays technology we are able to fully automate the billing process for the parts department of new car dealerships. Our system will automatically log into the dealerships DMS every night and download all newly created invoices into our website where we make those invoices available for their customers to view 24/7, then with just a click their customers will make their payments directly into the dealerships checking account.

Goojitsu is a provider of information. We took a concept as simple as searching the Internet and turned it into a skilled trade, and when it comes to our trade our Ninja's are the best. A client can ask Goojitsu to search for anything and everything, be it a person, place, thing, or even a business. Once a request is submitted then our Ninja's go to work. We lay the results out and will even explain our findings to the client.   	The scope of what we can search for is limitless and the privacy of our clients is our top priority. Maybe a mother wants a background check on a babysitter. Perhaps a college student needs research assistance.  Or maybe a businesses wants a potential partner or employee vetted. Goojitsu aims to develop a unique interface on our website. Allowing both private and business clients to register for service and receive results all through our client interface. The client will be assigned a Goojitsu staff member (Ninja) or a team of staff members depending on the project size, and through our client interface and be constantly kept in the loop on the information we've obtained thus far in the search. Our staff will also be able to request more information from the client as needed to help better our results, but in most cases only a little information is needed for us to start searching.   	Goojitsu not only hopes to offer affordable services but to also provide over 100 new IT jobs within our first two years.

Currently Peek@U hosts a base of over 35,000 unique users on the Android & iOS mobile platform in the United States, Europe and Australia.  This reach has been accomplished within months with no formal marketing campaign outside of hosting on Google Play. With proper marketing and technical support, Peek@U has the potential to grow to over 5 million users within a year’s time. To properly position Peek@U in the global social networking marketplace, an investment of $50,000 is necessary.

4D Energetics, Inc (California Corporation) was established in 2010 in Menlo Park, California.   Company develops stationary energy storage based on adsorption batteries. Technology is protected by two US patents. Company operates a 2000 sq. ft. manufacturing and laboratory facility in Menlo Park In 2011 Company received seed funding in the amount of $1.16 million on pre-money valuation of $2.5 million from venture capital firm Bright Capital. Pilot production of full-scale battery electrodes was successfully completed.  Batteries have been tested internally and independently at Sandia National Laboratory.  Company established partnership with two system integrators MegaBess (Korea) and Raytheon (USA), which have extensive network of customers and supply energy storage products with capacities from 1 kW-h to 1 MW-h and with suppliers of solar and wind generators, (Sea Breeze Power, Canada and IT Solar Systems, USA). ATS Automation (designer of facility for producing automotive batteries for Chevy Volt) was selected as a designer and manufacturer of mass production line.   Round A financing will be used to start manufacturing and sales of stand alone energy storage systems with capacity from 1 to 100 kW-h for off-grid and micro-grid customers.

PIPR_Name: Around the Bend Beer Co., LLC
PIPR_Description:
We are not renegades. We are not rebelling against anything (as many other beer brands claim to be). In fact, we believe that the revolution is over; the war has been won. Big beer is dead – they just don’t know it yet. And by dead, we mean irrelevant for millions of beer loving Americans. Sure they still have 90% market share. But the long, inexorable march of decline has begun for them and there’s no stopping it now. Will our kind of beer ever account for 90% of the beer people drink? Maybe not. But that’s not the point. Their vice-like grip on what we drink has been broken and for the initiates into the world of craft beer, there…is…no…going…back! End of story. And in that sense, the war has indeed been won. There is a predisposition now, for a large class of people, to expect better. And this allows for evermore experimentation and innovation with the form we know as craft beer. The road that lies ahead is a more exciting stretch than we have glimpsed to-date. So let’s keep going. Let’s see what’s Around the Bend. 

Around the Bend Beer Co. is a start-up production brewery based in Chicago, IL. In the first phase of it's life, Around the Bend will contract with an existing brewery to produce beer using our own proprietary, innovative recipes. The second phase will include the construction of our own brewery, which will lower production costs, boost margin/volume and, eventually, allow for expanded distribution on a multi-regional basis.

It’s Tuesday, and you’re sitting in History class. Your professor is writing an outline on the board and asks the class to turn to page 86 in the book. She then points to a map on the current slide. The guy next to you is looking up additional information on the region using Wikipedia. To add to the confusion, you’re trying to pay attention and take notes. You recognize all of these different media types relate to the same information but are conveyed in different formats. Why not consolidate and synchronize all of them into one coherent media stream? Better yet, why not publish this media stream for fellow students studying the same topic?

With the release of Kufuma, an Android App, students and educators will be able to weave media together and make money when they publish their weaves.

Art Hangup makes buying art easier for collectors, and selling art easier for galleries.  

Our app allows users to upload images of artwork encountered at galleries or fairs, either manually or through QR code scan, and then to virtually see that artwork on their wall.

It's as easy as 1, 2, 3:
For Users:  
1)  Snap a pic of your wall at home
2)  Scan a QR code of a painting you like at a gallery
3)  Instantly see how that painting looks on your wall at home

For Galleries:  
1)  Upload your inventory to the site (images + details)
2)  Print out and display your unique QR code on the gallery tag
3)  Make it easy for your clients to see your offerings on their walls.

Embedded growth engine:  QR codes displayed at galleries attract users, user expectation of QR codes attract galleries

Technology especially powerful at large art fairs, where keeping track of art of interest, along with art and contact details is very difficult

Future features will include gallery reach-out to users

Trinity Energy Group Inc. (“TEG” or “the Company”), a Nevada corporation headquartered in Irvine, California, is actively engaged in oil, gas and energy opportunities in North America, Central America and Worldwide. TEG’s scope of activity ranges from due-diligence for potential investments through development, supervision and management of drilling and production operations, oversight and management of investments, and execution of exit strategies for existing projects.  Trinity has assembled a team of seasoned experts with industry expertise and core-competencies to manage the investment life-cycle from project acquisition through development, drilling, production and exit strategy for investor liquidity of each project and investment.  

                                                                                                                   (The Kelly Lease)
The Kelly lease is approximately 40 acres in size and is located in Bakersfield Ca.  The interest to be acquired is 70% Working Interest (WI) and 56% Net Revenue Interest (NRI) and the lease contains approximately 6.7 million gross barrels of oil (mbo) in place (which equates to approximately 4.0 million barrels of oil recoverable) in five different producing zones of the China Grade formation which can be produced by a steam flood operation. Some 15 wells were drilled in the 1940’s and ‘50’s and were produced for a time. However, when oil prices plunged in the mid to late 1990’s, the operation became uneconomic and the operator of that time simply abandoned the field. The California Department of Oil and Gas assumed operations and performed abandonment procedures on the existing wells in 2002, which left most of the downhole piping in place. We believe that we can utilize these wells to serve as production wells but new steam injection wells will need to be drilled and equipped.

Embarr Downs is the only publicly traded Thoroughbred Stable.  We are currently trading on the OTC under the symbol EMBR.   The Company's business is the buying, selling and racing of thoroughbreds that can race in the allowance and stakes levels of thoroughbred racing; however, the Company will initially begin in the claiming level of thoroughbred racing. The Company intends to acquire 4-6 horses in its claiming division before acquiring horses for its allowance/stakes division. These 4-6 horses will provide the Company with revenue and a foundation to build out a stakes level stable. The Company’s main focus will be acquiring horses that will be capable of racing in stake races throughout the Country. However, the Company expects to maintain 8-10 thoroughbreds in its claiming division.   Allowance races are a race other than claiming for which the racing secretary drafts certain conditions (see below for more details).  Stake races are the top level races.  The purse money is significantly higher in allowance and stakes level races.  Claiming refers to the process by which a licensed person may purchase a horse entered in a race designated as a “claiming race” for a predetermined price. When a horse has been claimed, its new owner assumes title after the starting gate opens although the former owner is entitled to all purse money earned in that race.  Claiming races are lowest level in thoroughbred racing. Stakes and allowance races are races in which the horses are not for sale.   	We are looking to raise capital to begin our breeding program.

The health and wellness industry has been on a rapid incline the last few years. Plain Jane and Average Joe are finally fed up with spending counts hours at Globo gym in a fruitless attempt of exercise. They have spent days, weeks, months and years in a gym with no sense of community and little care for their members. It is no surprise that people are flocking in droves to boxes around the world. In these boxes they are achieve health and wellness goals they could never have imagined. They are finding community, friendship and competition. They are not only getting in shape, but many of them are becoming elite athletes. This is seen in no better of a place then during team competitions. Here stay at home moms strive on the same teams as ex-D1 middle linebackers. Every athlete is cheered and encouraged to show and strive for the indomitable will of the human spirit.  We believe we can catch those moments on film and allow the world to be moved by the teams and competition. With an extremely talented director leading the way we believe we can move the world. The show will show is set into a 16-team elimination series for a total of 13 episodes competing for a $200,000 grand prize. In the end we will crown one box the King of the box. In every weekly hour episode of Box Jump, one box “jumps” another box. Each box will have two teams of 6 athletes (3 women and 3 men). The teams will compete in two pre-programmed 4-person team workouts and two 2- person events. Each event will be given point values leading up to the final event. The point system will be set up that the losing team and steal the competition in the final event.   	We are looking to bring the life and community that is shown in these competitions. To Truly show why all of use love this community as much as we do. This is going to be are very special project and the possibilities are nearly quite endless. This is a strong community that is growing at a rapid pace.

Wingman is an app that makes the air travel experience more social: travelers can connect to one another from the moment they book their flight until after they touch down at their destination. Through Wingman, they can connect to anyone on their flight(s), in overlapping airports, headed to their destination (from anywhere else in the world), or at their destination. 

Air travel has become boring, solitary, yet filled with downtime. Wingman re-introduces the social layer to the experience, making it more fun, while creating an opportunity for travelers to take advantage of ephemeral connections that only exist in a flight context. 

By creating a social experience to mitigate the frustrations of flying, we can also capitalize on travelers' irritation and boredom and turn these sentiments into opportunities for valuable connections and potential revenue with airport/travel partnerships.
