Bell Boardz, established in 2013 by I, Lambert O. Egbuchulam, as a sole proprietorship, is a start-up company that will be selling/distributing my new patented product Bell Boards.   Ever since I was a kid I loved to skateboard.  I use to take my skateboard everywhere because I found it cool, fun and exciting.  But I realized it wasn't an easy activity to do. As I got older, I started minimizing the use of my skateboard because it became less about it being cool or fun, and more about the most feasible way to get from place to place.  That is where a bicycle beats a skateboard.  It is a lot easier to ride a bike than to skateboard.   That's why more people ride bikes around the world.  When I came up with the idea of my company and product I wanted to create a new product line of skateboards that are as easy to ride as riding a bike, because there is a safer and more comfortable feeling biking than skateboarding.  I came up with the product, the Bell Boards.  Bell Boards are the only skateboards of its kind that combines the safety and comfort of a bike with the thrill of skateboarding. My company, Bell Boardz, offer types of skateboards whose primarily goal is to emulate that feeling of biking while skateboarding, that easiness.  With its dumbbell structure, foam padding, and ball wheels the Bell Boards offer THE easier alternative to traditional skateboarding without compromising the excitement.  My company is still in the developing phase so there is still some nooks and crannies that need to be worked out.  With room to expand the product line, such as room for additional products, multiple styles, qualities, and price ranges, the company and its product is poised for growth.   I, Lambert O Egbuchulam, am the founder and 100% owner of Bell Boardz, and anything else proprietary to it.  The company will currently operate from a home office.

Fluid Stone LLC. (“Fluid Stone” or the “Company”) is a Florida, LLC, founded in August 2006 and located in Orange, California. The Company develops, manufactures and sells a wide range of proprietary stone surface finish products, designed for use in interior and exterior applications to vertical and horizontal surfaces. The products are well suited for both commercial and residential buildings, often in specialized applications not possible with traditional stone and cement-based building surface products.   	 The Company’s technologically advanced building surface products are applied during the construction and/or renovation process and are comprised of water-based, cross-link polymers combined with natural stone and recycled glass aggregate, resulting in a highly attractive finish. Designed as specialized surface finishes, not as base (substrate) materials, the Fluid Stone line of products are cost-competitive alternatives to the materials for which it is designed as a substitute: plaster, stucco, vinyl and wood siding, masonry veneer, linoleum, tile, marble and granite.

Visidom is a cloud web analytics tool that shows website owners and digital agencies how a visitor exactly feels when using their site just as if they were looking over his shoulder.   	Visidom is a cloud tool that monitors visitors’ behaviour on a website and then provides visual analytics. Visidom records mouse cursor movement, clicks, keystrokes, scrolls, screen resolution and many others of every visitor of a website. Visidom then visualizes the results for the website owner directly on his page once he logs in at Visidom. Visidom has three main functions: heatmaps visualizing visitors’ eye attention - clicks heatmap, mouse movement heatmap, vertical attention heatmaps; visitor playbacks showing exactly what each visitor saw on his screen during visit; form analytics with thourough reports on form fields (drop report, average editing time report, etc.). It’s possible to filter data above all three functions by browser, country, date and lenght of visit, etc.

ENTvantage Dx, is an early-stage diagnostics company that provides Primary Care and ENT physicians with timely information on the cause of ear, nose and throat illnesses with rapid, in-office diagnostic tests.  Our first product is for rapid, in-office diagnosis of bacterial rhinosinusitis by offering a first-of-its-kind diagnostic kit that can definitively diagnose bacterial sinusitis and differentiate it from the more common viral sinusitis. The product will allow primary care physicians and otolaryngologists to easily take mucus samples and perform a rapid, accurate, point-of-care lateral flow assay to determine if a patient is positive for bacterial pathogens commonly associated with bacterial rhinosinusitis.  This information will allow physicians to reduce the amount of antibiotics used to treat sinusitis, increase revenue to the clinic and reduce the number of antibiotic resistant infections.

ThinkBIG Education Technology developed Thebullytracker.com to address the growing problem of cyber and physical bullying using Collect, Connect, Protect, our proprietary framework for integrating multiple sources of information about bullying activity. In the Collect phase, we automatically extract bullying activity from social media sources including Twitter, Instagram, and Reddit, and provide applications for users to report bullying activity through the web, mobile, voice, email, and SMS text.   In the Connect phase, we apply data analytics to normalize and enrich bullying data, allowing users to perform real-time queries and define standing alerts to automatically detect and report patterns of bullying activity in a defined area or against one or more individuals.  In the Protect phase, we provide workflow tools for parents, schools, children and law enforcement to track and report Bullying activity, interfacing to established processes and procedures while providing a next-generation activity workflow system for authorities.

The Company was formed to receive passive royalty income from an exclusive license with a purchase option for Low-E, pending patent technology, the first to allow interior wall and roof insulation to reflect radiation.  A house and industrial building prove the concept.  It can: (1) halve heating and cooling equipment, operation, maintenance and replacement cost for most buildings; (2) covert heat to usable energy; and (3) cost-efficiently re-insulate existing buildings.   	Soleil Insulation has completed its development and design, and is now offering the exclusive license to multinational companies.  No outside funding has been received to date. The total investment needed to complete the business plan is $125,000. The strategy is to receive a license fee within 12 months to repay all investment, royalty payments within 12 to 24 months, and a fixed-formula sale within 5 to 7 years.  The agreement would include a marketing and sales or sub-licensing obligation, a period of exclusive use, and then an obligation to license at a fixed-formula royalty to all comers. Roof or wall surface insulation prototypes and controls are currently being designed and made for testing by fiberglass and other multinationals manufactures, the Lawrence National Laboratory's Energy & Environment Group; and to the California’s Energy and Building Standards commissions.   	Only one multinational manufacturer is needed to effectuate our mission: to make Low-E technologies available worldwide at competitive prices.  We are working with multinational companies, several with more than a billion dollars of annual insulation sales, and all doing business in more than 50 countries. These include multinationals such as DuPont, Knauf, Bayer’s Material Science Division, Saint Gobain’s U.S. subsidiary, CertainTeed.  We are also working with some radiant barrier manufacturers.

PIPR_Name: Women of Coffee, Inc. dba Corporate Cares
PIPR_Description:
Women of Coffee is a California C Corporation that was incorporated in December 2013 by Karen Cebreros, a serial entrepreneur focused on developing social businesses. Cebreros, CEO of Women of Coffee, is a pioneer in the sustainability efforts in the coffee industry and was the leader in visioning, developing and implementing the introduction of organic green coffee bean trading in North America.

Women of Coffee provides products and services that empower corporations, employees and industries to measure, track and ultimately increase activities that improve human engagement, environmental impact and profitability.  

The development of Corporate Cares was strongly driven by Cerebros’s vision: “We imagine unleashing the power of and potential of every employee to revitalize their community.”  With an already established, vertically integrated market in the coffee and beverage industry, Women of Coffee is expanding its reach to the larger corporate market.  

Women of Coffee is seeking a total of up to US $350,000 to market and sell Corporate Cares.  The company is selling 700,000 shares at $.50/share which represents 35% of the company.  There is a minimum investment of $5,000. 

Women of Coffee intends to buy back its equity from our investors in Year 5 based on a third-party valuation.  The investor can also choose to retain its equity until Exit Strategy is executed in later years.

Exit Strategy will depend on certain market conditions.  We have the option of selling the book of business to Profits 4 Purpose.  We would also look to anyone who could potentially buy Profits 4 Purpose to also buy Women of Coffee.  

Another potential Exit Strategy may evolve as other, larger players get into the sustainability cloud software industry and want to buy, rather than build a customer base.

Dropping the price of human genome sequencing to under $1000 will open a new era of personalized medicine. Sequencing requires preparation of uniformly sized DNA libraries and accounts for significant fraction of the final cost.  We are working on developing of novel approach of enzymatic generation of uniformly sized DNA pools. This will be a platform for quick and inexpensive library preparation for NextGen Sequencing.   	Without going into technical details, the main principle is control of termination: DNA polymerase will be forced to “freeze” when the product of certain, predefined length is synthesized. One particular implementation of the technology is “size-specific PCR”. Contrary to regular PCR, which is sequence-specific, size-specific PCR will be able to generate uniformly sized pools of DNA for only a fraction of current time, cost and amount of starting material. The product can be made barcoaded during the reaction, thus giving single step library prep method for NGS.

Next Glass is a North Carolina based research and technology company that delivers personalized beer and wine recommendations to consumers and merchants. Next Glass then uses machine-learning software to learn what you enjoy to provide great recommendations straight to your smartphone, tablet or computer.

3D printing should be about printing stuff, not tinkering with a printer. That's what Ez3D is all about. Most printers are built for hobbyists and electronics enthusiasts tinkering in a garage. We are creating printers that help you get printing.

Our hardware has a few unique features to it.  The main distinction is our Z-axis design. Most printers use a long screw to move the build table up and down. Low quality screws can lead to poor quality prints, though, so we've replaced the Z screw with a belt system that allows for rapid movement and smooth prints.

Our software also helps 3D printer users in several aspects. Not only does it include filament inventory management, but also provides a parts library and Thingiverse integration. Our software is also the only software with "print recovery," allowing you to "rewind" a failed print to attempt to recover it.

And finally, we're making it affordable. Starting at $375, our printer is one of the most affordable out there.

DERP TECH  is a MICROGRID and community energy resiliency systems design, stakeholder development, project management  and maintenance training company.   With the development of its own power continuity technologies, we bridge gaps between the "legacy grid" and the "smart grid".

DERP TECH's "SAFE HAVEN MICROGRID(tm)  FOR SCHOOLS"  model provides scalable  replication opportunities for improving community energy resilience.   We desire to rapidly design/build multiple Safe Haven-style  sheltering facilities for communities, schools and businesses across America.

DERP TECH's  business model captures the spirit of America's growing interest in energy resiliency and community  energy ownership.   We offer local and regional energy assurance plans, comprehensive feasibility studies, grant writing  and technical decision  support. 

Regional-scale energy security and resiliency projects benefit from our interconnection systems and device designed for use at the substation-level of local electrical distribution systems to enable injection of more clean, local power to serve local loads. DERP TECH's PCU, a Power Continuity Unit, manages and controls critical-load profiling, load shedding of non-critical loads and integration of local power and storage sources as needed to keep power on at a network of local critical infrastructure operations and sheltering facilities. 
DERP TECH provides educational and training programs for planning commissioners,, elected officials, peers, regulators and utility executives in support of the energy security, economic and environmental value and benefits of microgrids and distributed generation.
 Growth strategies include strategic partnerships with industry leaders in power control electronics and community energy resiliency systems.

Many vets have gained knowledge and experience in certain fields that can lead them into starting a small business in that field.  What these vets lack is the proper guidance and knowledge in starting a business such as developing a business plan, learning business and tax laws, basics of accounting, obtaining capital, how and where to buy products, internet and social media advertising, banking issues and generally just running a small business.  The founder of this corporation has operated several small businesses over 50 years and is now at the age where other vets can benefit from his knowledge and business experience in several fields.  With the guidance of the founder who has two current businesses, vets can begin working on a part-time or full-time basis and gain experience and knowledge of business requirements and later take over management and ownership of the businesses.  The founder also knows other small business owners close to retirement willing to train and assist vets to acquire their businesses.  Running this corporation on a for-profit basis ensures continued capital available to generate more opportunities for vets with potential.   A panel of small businessmen recruited by VETS USA will interview potential vets, then guide, train, encourage and assist them in developing their future plus provide some necessary start-up capital,   Experience has shown banks, SBA or other entities will not typically provide capital for a start-up business and certainly not provide any small business knowledge and experience.  VETS

No Boundaries Brewing Empire (NBBE) is a soon-to-be launched artisanal craft brewery along the Buffalo River in Buffalo, New York.  Co-owners Chris Carboni and Lou Ann Loveless have spent the last several years moving toward the goal of creating unique beer in a unique City of Buffalo location, giving patrons a truly fun, unique and tasty experience. “No Boundaries” means just that—NBBE ventures outside the conventional rules of beer making to offer distinctive tastes and textures not only from beer to beer, but from batch to batch.  NBBE celebrates the varied explosive flavors and the subtle notes which are often hidden or eliminated for the sake of uniformity in the mass marketed and even many craft brewed beers of today.  Brewmaster Carboni has been creating well-received, delicious beers since 2007. Carboni was joined by his friend and NBBE business manager Loveless the following year as demand began to outpace Carboni’s ability to keep up with demands for the small batches of beer created in his basement brewery. The last several years have been spent in due diligence, perfecting recipes, testing ideas, and searching out the ideal location for the brewery.   Over the last 8 months, a site was chosen and architectural design work began. Marketing strategies have been designed and implemented; including branding and the design of a logo and website.  With a lease secured for space in an historic building nestled among grain elevators and malt houses along the Buffalo River, NBBE has also begun the process of acquiring state and local licenses and permits for operation. Early design work for the space calls for a tap room, tasting room, banquet space, and an outdoor patio on the banks of the river. NBBE is proud to look over the horizon to a day very soon, when Buffalonians will be enjoying handcrafted, delicious, unique beer in one of the city’s up-and-coming locations, in the shadows of plans for both the Buffalo River/Silo City area and nearby Ohio Street.

We are first to market with our telemedicine based distance monitored physical therapy exercise (“DMpt”) program  which has been specifically designed to prevent pre-diabetic patients from becoming type 2 diabetic.   	Our program combines in-office direct-contact physical therapy eval uations, re-evaluations and physical performance testing with an on-line telemedicine exercise program that is fully monitored by our in-house physical therapists to increase patient engagement and program success. We also enroll our patients in an online healthy living nutrition and meal planning program.   	Our initial services and business plan is specifically built around a 25-year partnership agreement with Millennium Healthcare, Inc. (MHCC) that has 450-plus physicians that currently see approximately 75,000 patients per week in over 200 practices in metropolitan New York and Northern New Jersey.   	There are no current direct competitors. There are brick and mortar physical therapy business everywhere  (i.e.: U.S. Physical Therapy) that have only direct contact business models that have no telemedicine products and very low patient loads. There are also telemedicine physical therapy businesses such as  www.physiotec.ca that create and sells exercise video to physical therapists, but their business is not insurance reimbursable and there is little patient engagement.   	A majority of the MHI patients are sedentary and pre-diabetic with some coronary issues. Our initial contract covers the New York City and northern New Jersey tri-borough area (19.8 million people), the most populated region in the United States.   	Our Physical Therapy Program allows us to bill a patient’s insurance for traditional in-office patient visits and for our telemedicine exercise program sessions. Our low program cost to an insurer is up to approximately $3,000 per patient.

Safelain is the first ever all natural and edible oxidation indicator or responsive expiration date. It works by changing its color once oxidation occurs and can be calibrated to match the rate of oxidation with the applied pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, or food product. Safelain can be directly blended, coated, or applied to an independent vessel (packaging) while responding to levels of moisture, oxygen, temperature, and radiation. The main component in Safelain is a very powerful antioxidant, betalain, derived from beets and calibrated to change from an orange, yellow, or red starting color to a brown which indicates oxidation. Examples of betalains and their oxidation products can be found here: http://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/jf400818s

In 2000, Jon Kitto and Alonso Saldivar owned  a commercial service firm. Every day was a crisis--  the nature of the business.
As a diversion  they adopted a dog. They went to a  ‘Meet and Greet.’ There they met  a fawn , timid little girl.  They named her “GiGi.”
Gigi was shy and fearful. The solution was: “get another one!”
There was an  old boy that had just been saved from death.. He was in  the desert  starved,  hairless and covered with ticks.He had been adopted by a man who turned him loose in the desert to die.
Dying was not on his agenda.  However, upon entering their house, Buck jumped on the bed with pointed ears and tail wagging, as if to say the past is the past and life is for living-- let’s get on with it!”
Each day his strength grew and his fur grew back. He made a difference to Gigi who became confident and strong. Shortly after his adoption, it was decided that that dog had too much dignity to simply be “Buck,” so he forever more became “Mister Buck.”
Because of Mr. Buck's attitude,  the  business was sold and Jon and Alonso committed their lives to god, rescue and care. Soon Mr. Buck was leading  dogs in nursing home visits and working with children of incarcerated gang members. 

Since the time of first meeting Mr. Buck, Jon and Alonso have cared for more than 1000 dogs and had 52 of their own.

Mr. Buck lived an incredible 14 years and 6 months, passing Thanksgiving week 2009. He is buried in the Memory Garden at Greyhound Boarding & Retirement Kamp – GBARK- which Mr. Buck was responsible for founding.

To  to honor Mr. Buck’s memory and provide ongoing financial support for rescues everywhere,  “Mister Buck’s Genuinely Good Pet Food Company,” was created.  They have taken time and great care to select ingredients that have the quality to carry the venerated “Mr. Buck” name.

A portion of each purchase goes directly to  Animal Rescue with an  amount going to (GBARK). Mister Buck’s legacy is to help provide pets that will become their own legends

The Xcel Prototypes of Proprietary Clinical-Grade Human Stem Cell Therapy Products Provide Future Medicine for CNS and Heart Regeneration in Unmet Medical Needs:

Our first step was to prove the solution as a "Minimally Viable Product" by beta-testing the solution on a brand new company that had no brand, no products and no website. Its just that now they expect that nurturing to be offered electronically.   	#3: The number of new competing technologies is so hard to process that the timing of communications is critical to whether or not a company will get noticed.   	Key Takeaways: It takes six contacts to close a sale.  We generate 4 contacts in 72 hours and we shorten the sales cycle by months.  Which for SaaS companies can be the difference between success and failure.   	We use Advanced Marketing Automation (Email, Social and Mobile), Pixel Tracking and Expert Nurturing to deliver significant workable leads in as little as a few weeks.   	Our initial prospecting for our own efforts has yielded an impressive roster of prospects and deal flow.  From Google Ventures to CEO's of recent IPO technology companies.  The solution just plain works.

We believe in respect of personal data privacy, controlled and mediated by its owners. This is attributed to the large centralized servers’ model, malicious users and sophisticated tracking tools.  We address all of these growing issues with Tego. Tego is a simple stand-alone device packed with smart applications that empowers users to secure and manage their personal data in a controlled way while protecting their privacy. Tego is designed with three levels of innovation. First user’s privacy is achieved with a decentralized P2P approach. A new investment class of non-accredited investors has been authorized in the United States to invest in private equity ventures. Successful individuals that are currently in the working middle class can now use private equity investing to move to new emerging investment class. Thanks, to a small business investment bill that passed Congress and was signed into law by President Obama on April 5, 2012, as part of the Jobs Act. This new law made it possible for non-unaccredited investors to invest in early stage business ventures for the first times, since the 1930s. The biggest challenge these small investors will face is where and how to find quality private venture to invest in. Many that are new to equity investing will turn to special event conferences and seminars to get information, before they invest.   Industry experts have estimated that when the law is fully implemented the pool of potential investors could expand from 2 million to over 50 million investors. We estimated that from 30% to 40% of all new business start-ups will use some form of Concept Funding that include crowd funding donations, business formation grants, equity and/or venture capital. According to industry research and the World Bank, Concept funding generated $5.1 billion in funding transactions in 2013 and will surpass $300 billion in equity funding transactions by 2025.

The leadership in North American churches and business are in trouble.  Leaders are severely over-worked and under-appreciated.  Severe burn out and career changes are a result.  Retreat facilities and conference centers are two things that are used to attempt to combat this ever growing problem.  However, both are inadequate on their own.  Retreat centers offer short term escape from the reality of everyday life; but reality still exists after returning from the retreat.  Conference centers teach attendees how to handle problems; but the solutions learned are nearly always conceptual and do not address the specific problems of the attendee. Rocky Mountain Oasis has combined the retreat center with the conference center and addressed the weaknesses of both.  An oasis is a place to escape the deadliness of the desert and to become refreshed and equipped to continue the remainder of the journey.  So is Rocky Mountain Oasis.  The Rocky Mountain Oasis experience begins with the oasis on the horizon.  We invite specific leadership teams to our facility and customize their experience so that they receive precisely the escape, the rejuvenation, and the tools they need to be able to go back out into life and complete the journey.  This begins with pre-stay interviews and preparations, continues with a time of retreat and conference at our facility, and culminates with post-stay follow-up and encouragement.  The Rocky Mountain Oasis experience ends when the leadership team has reached the edge of the desert and no longer needs nurturing or encouragement. Our owners (Joe & Kathy McCarn, and Sharon Stoeber) have spent the past eleven years (and perhaps their entire lives) preparing for this endeavor.  With the right experience, contacts, and education, we are now prepared to help others to reach more of their potential.

Auto Load Logic brings the management of auto transport into the 21st century. Its industry-leading software platform connects those who need to ship cars with the brokers who arrange shipment and the truckers who provide the transport service.   	      It allows each party to the process to search for solutions, to evaluate alternatives, to contract for service, to  document vehicle condition, to track transport en-route and to pay or be paid upon completion. All in a single, seamless, end-to-end, paperless process.   	      The full-featured version of the platform was built for professional users: car dealers, auction houses, fleet owners, transport companies and transport brokerage companies.   	      As more vehicle transactions are taking place on-line, more individuals need to arrange vehicle shipment. Most have no experience and many make poor, and often expensive, choices. So we have also  created a version of the platform to serve the individual market.   	      The dominant product in our market  was introduced in 1999. It has not kept pace with changes either in technology or in the industry. Its strength is in its professional customer base, which has been offered little alternative over the years. However, that customer base is broadly dissatisfied with the product's lack of functionality and its focus on one participant in the transport chain -- the car dealer -- to the detriment of the broker and carrier communities. That product does not offer an option for the individual user.   	      Auto Load Logic was conceived and created by transport industry professionals. Our founders know the business from the ground up and that hands-on, in-depth knowledge informs both our product and our management.   	      The vehicle transport business is changing dramatically as the way both professionals and individuals buy cars. That is driving dramatic change in the vehicle transport market, which now needs a new and more effective solution.   	      Auto Load Logic is that solution.

Today, internet discussions and conventional media have reached an openly discussed and disregarded position of agenda (bias).  The media presented to the world is often conflicting, false, lacking depth of context, without timing, and without being socially, ethically,  and politically responsible.  The data we are provided it often seems, is designed for political purpose.   	Social Media today has provided a wonderful opportunity for every individual to have a world wide voice. The problem with that voice is that it remains unvetted and without  credibility.  Further, our voices are seldom rolled up into a single regional, national, or world consensus.  Instead, it tends to roll down towards chaos and public scrutiny with propagation of unvetted single viewpoints (Blogs) clouded by agenda bias,  and/or conflicting data depicting adolescent and unethical behavior.  The result being that nothing can be trusted or taken as truth by the intellectual eye.   	Criers Podium – A Solution   	In short, a “Game Changer”.  We are, a group of four engineers  who have developed a way to make discourse events such as topical discussions and news interactive through a social media framework that supports and rolls thousands of  users comments and opinions into a sets of non-biased statistical instantaneous demographic consensus. We address credibility and ethical behavior of both user and data through the development and use of our  proprietary and patentable web based “Credibility  Engine”.   In addition our platform based web framework establishes a structure for self policing and vetting of data context allowing our Statistical Engine (SE) to roll up user feedback and present it in a graphically displayed statistical demographic form.  Hence CP promotes responsible participation through ethical behavior and peer vetted data rolled up into concise consensus for  both instantaneous snapshot and trend based statistical feedback to the users, groups, topic, provider, and the world.

Nebel.TV is an open-source and free software technology which can be used to share media content (video, audio or still picture), pay for it in Bitcoins, and get paid for their in-app activities, including own content sharing, viewing advertisements, give comments, ratings or curate media lists for others.  We help to remove all the technological barriers of distributing media content (format adjustments, network limitations, etc.) and deliver the peer-to-peer media content exchange service to the mobile users. The software is also featured with stationary devices (TV dongle and set-top-box) providing access to the Nebel.TV content via at the large TV sets. Using these devices users can access home stored content, release new video and share it seamlessly to the network. Alongside with free apps there will be number of commercial services provided in the network: content seeding, consent ads, media broadcaster products and bitcoin based payment escrow.

Stonehenge Gardens has an available target market of an estimated 40 million tourists that visit Las Vegas every year as well as its local Clark County population of over 2 million for additional revenues from visitation and event venue use.   	Stonehenge Gardens will be strategically located on 2.5 acres just 3 miles south of the Mandalay Bay on the Las Vegas strip with 770 feet of frontage on Interstate 15. Intrastate 15 has a traffic count of 42,500 cars a day which is 42% of the all of the traffic coming into Las Vegas per day. The property zoning permits up to a 100 linier foot illuminated double sided pylon sign to be built on the highway frontage.  57% of all visitors to Las Vegas travel by car, bus, RV, or truck. The close proximity to the Las Vegas strip insures the easy access to venue. A short cab ride will allow for easy access and an affordable ride to and from Stonehenge Gardens for those who arrive by air or bus.

Sail Freight International was the first company in this country to successfully use auxiliary wind propulsion system on modern merchant ships. Today we are still the only company in the world who has used AWP cost-effectively. The system was called COMSAIL and was used during the energy crisis in the early 1980s. Today we have improved our AWP system significantly. The new AWP system is called the COMSAIL Wing; it is fully automatic, provides real-time thrust analysis, has a lift coefficient six times greater and a utilization rate 20% greater. We already have a degree of interest from the shipping community so we are now looking to file two Utility Patents – one mechanical and the other for software. Provisional Patents have been filed but the Utility Patents must be completed by 1 September.  Ninety percent of everything moves my ship at some point. SFI will be looking to put AWP on tankers and gearless bulk carriers. The cost of fuel on these vessels is 70-80% of operating costs. The IMO and the USCG are pressuring ship  owners to reduce GHG emissions - ships are the sixth largest emitters of GHG in the world, behind China, Russia, India and Japan. Some ports are forcing ships to switch to shore-power while in port and lighter fuels while entering ports. There are very few options to reduce fuel consumption on ships. They include 1) traveling slower, 2) better hull coatings and 3) small adjustments to the main engine. In brief, the shipping industry needs to find a way to reduce fuel consumption and wind is one of the ways to do it; it is the only way to power a ship without increasing GHG emissions. Capt. Anderson, a principal of SFI, wrote his graduate thesis on how to equate hull roughness in terms of energy savings. This same technology will be used in one of the two utility patents being filed. The money will be used to cover the Patent filings and some of the overhead.

A New Paradigm for Natural Resource Investment
GoldKey offers a new way to invest in natural resources that mitigates risk and maximizes liquidity while creating opportunities for long-term growth. Many, if not most, junior explorers and miners fail at the precise moment of greatest opportunity—after the discovery of a significant resource. GoldKey acquires or joint ventures with junior mining companies that have already taken the risk of greenfield exploration and identified promising prospects, but may be unable to bring a project to market or into production. GoldKey evaluates these prospects, completes geological work if necessary, analyzes the provenance/validity of mineral licenses and concession agreements, and then prepares properties for sale or trade to mid-tier or major mining companies, or enters into joint venture partnerships. 

Old Hands, New Ideas
GoldKey’s geographical area of specialization is Africa, particularly West Africa. West Africa is perhaps the most prospective gold region in the world. GoldKey has an extraordinarily seasoned team of exploration and mining professionals, investment and merchant bankers, fund managers, political and security analysts, and contract negotiators. The GoldKey team has owned, managed, bought and sold mines and mineral properties in Africa, advised private and public companies and sovereign governments. Investors will not pay for anyone’s apprenticeship. The company's approach is new but its principals are old hands, with insight gained the hard way, over time and in the real world. This is a unique opportunity to participate in a new paradigm for resource development that is practical, timely, in-demand, market-focused, and fiscally conservative.

Jim Pandol & Co. is a California based shipper and distributor of fresh produce from the Southwestern United States and  Western Mexico to domestic and international markets. The company oversees the smooth chain of distribution from field to grocery store, ensuring quality and safety along the way, and pre-selling the produce to our established customers, before their products reach international borders. The company is requesting funding of $770,000 for short-term working capital necessary to assist fruit producers in Mexico for shipments into United States and Canada.

The company currently a well-known and trusted brokerage firm for some of the most successful and well-respected growers in the entire Mexican region, providing integrated Sales, Marketing, and Consulting services to assist growers sell their crops with a minimum of headaches, and maximum profits. Jim Pandol & Co’s experience in farming and agricultural markets; and commitment to their growers and customers is the key to their success, and the reason for the current expansion and additional funding requirements.

The primary goal of Jim Pandol & Co. is to expand our, already successful, operation in a manner that deepens our business relationships with our growers in Mexico and Southern California; while effectively providing our investors an adequate return on their investment.

During the initial phase of the investment, our company will assist our growers through the planting, raising, cultivating, harvesting, packing and shipping of the extra sweet grapes, honeydew melons, fresh and frozen strawberries products the company intends to market for sale to its Grocery Store Customers. 

Crops are produced in cycles according to their season. Some growers need financial help at time of planting; others do not need outside financing until time of harvest and shipping.

Lilianna Spinal Solutions is a concept level start up company which will be developing a series of novel devices which address spinal stabilization / fusion. Spinal fusion, with a global market of $ 4.5 B, represents the largest sector of the $ 10 B global spinal market. Currently, the most common technique used to achieve posterior spinal fusion is the placement of pedicle screws. While this has been the "platinum," standard for many years, there is a great deal of excitement today about identifying alternatives to pedicle screws. Currently, the main alternative is Facet Fixation, followed by Spinous Process fixation. Both of these techniques are expected to generate markets of over $ 2 B by 2017. Our lead product, the Faci-LOK, will be a safer, more technically facile, and faster alternative to all of these techniques. Additionally,  a number of other unique applications of this technology can be hypothesized which could address other fundamentally important problems in spinal surgery today. Therefore, our technology will address some fundamental unmet needs in the spine.

Dark Angel Productions produces, promotes and organizes live music events and concerts in southern California at both open air venues and enclosed theater venues. DAP (Dark Angel Productions) promotes all types of music with a bias toward rock. Live events which are held at open air venues tend to have larger audiences and also offer vendor and sponsor spaces producing additional revenue streams.  Each event or festival produced by DAP has its own theme depending upon the genre of music for each event. Professional sound and lighting companies are contracted for each event or festival to achieve the maximum thrill impact for each performance, enhancing the enjoyment of the audience. Special synchronized lighting and laser effects are employed with every event as well as custom stage design by professional design teams. Security for every event is always a priority to ensure the safety of all attendees. Event insurance is always purchased by DAP whether or not it is provided by the venue, and DAP hires police for traffic control and paramedics on standby during the course of each event. Festival and concert souvenirs are always an additional income source as well as food and beverage, and sponsorships. Starting next year DAP has plans to do a 20 city concert tour across the United States featuring celebrity headliners at large venues.

Nestfunder.com is a startup with the sole purpose of establishing a site to facilitate peer to peer equity lending for the purchase of single family residences. The plan is to structure the deal the same way a commercial real estate investor would with a co investor, in which the co investor will get a preferred interest rate return as well as a piece of the upside equity. The borrower would upload needed documents and  havetheir credit pulled and rated. The borrower will then request an equity amount that is needed in order for them to close on their home. Investors will be able to then place bids on how much money they will lend and at what terms. The borrower will then select which Investors to go with and will use our preapproved documents in order to close the equity deal. Borrowers will have the option to have nestfunder act as a mortgage broker and have mortgage offers come in from several different mortgage lenders as well.

With Yuru, users are always completely in control over what they share and how they share: they can choose to ask questions and share advice either publicly or anonymously, and Yuru’s filters enable users to control how they see and receive advice, and from whom. Users are encouraged and incentivized to provide useful, meaningful advice through in-app rewards.

PingMe is a smartphone social networking app with the explicit goal of taking social networking offline and back into the real world.  The primary goal is to have users interact in the real world based on hobbies, interests, and social gatherings they can design themselves.  This is achieved through the use of two functions: The Broadcast – which is the creation of an activity in a predefined geographical area using interest tags – and the Ping, which is the notification a user receives when an event is created that aligns with their interests.  

We monetize the app through the placement of contextual and geo-targeted native ads to users based on their usage, Broadcasts, and Pings, which are tracked in real-time; this allows for the creation of millions of data-points and a data-rich environment that advertisers can tap in to.

3. Maintaining control of e-mail you send. Using ECS, you, the sender, can change your message content, including attachments, after sending it. Edit it, delete it, even make it disappear several seconds after it had been read.

Eye Phone App... How Does it Work? As currently designed in the technical drawings and 3-D models, the app has unique features not presently available in the marketplace.  Although the programming has not yet been developed and is still in the developmental stages, an explanation of possible operation is as follows: The primary function of Eye Phone is to help the user better see, read, and type on their phone or tablet. The user will be able to adjust the phone or tablet screen to their eyesight. Since the user will not always be the same distance from their phone or tablet, the user can have several different focus settings saved to the app. This will allow the user to quickly and easily adjust the screen for their eyes. The user will have the option to focus the screen three different ways, by prescription strength, an eye chart or manually adjusting the screen.

What Problem(s) Does it Solve?

The unique features of this app will provide the following benefits for all consumers:
• Allows the user to adjust the phone or tablet screen to their eyesight

• Saves the user time and energy by not having to squint to read their phone or tablet

• Gives the user 3 different options to adjust the screen

Marketing
Mr. O’ Connor envisions his product appealing to multitudes of consumers worldwide who use     their “smart phones” not only for communication but also for innovative solutions. The markets are extensive for an ingenious app like Eye Phone; Google Play and iTunes are the most popular app stores in the primary market and are the ideal places to market this app. However, for the Android version of the app there are several new stores popping all over the cyber world such as, AppsLib, Samsung Apps, F-Droid, Slide ME, GetJar, and Amazon App Store for Android. Mr. O’ Connor wishes to leave the market open for subsequent variances and possibilities that could improve the feasibility and marketability of his product.

The chemicals Yel002 and CJ010 were isolated from 16,000 chemicals from a chemical library as treatments against radiation induced genotoxicity and genetic instability. After radiation with a lethal dose that killed 100% of the mice and the first injection of Yel002 24 hours after radiation we could rescue 100%. Yel002 is also active against UV, and toxic chemicals and carcinogens EMS, MMS, nitrogen mustard, radioactive iodine and cigarette smoke extract induced DNA damage. Yel002 and CJ010 reduced radiation induced leukemia from 90% to 40% and the spontaneous frequency from 10% to 0%. Weekly subcutaneous injections of Yel002 also extended the life expectancy of cancer prone Atm deficient mice of which usually 90% die from lymphoma for 16 weeks which is about 12 years of human life expectancy. Yel002 also extended the life span in a senescence assay after radiation 2 fold and spontaneous senescence 15%. The mechanism of action seems to be induction of DNA repair, namely ATM signalling, homologous recombination, and end joining, base excision repair and chromosome segregation functions.

The focus here however is to introduce our flagship aircraft entitled “Vindicatore” which translated from Italian means avenger.

Our product is a modern UAV design using existing aerodynamic and mechanical design. Currently the UAV industry has attempted to use current technologies and apply them to a new problem. However what should and needs to be done is use current technology in a new and innovative fashion. We are not attempting to reinvent the wheel or change Bernoulli’s equations. What we are attempting to do is use modern methodology and technique and views the box from a different perspective without breaking principles. Our technology implies high factors of improvement in the areas of range, and maneuverability using technologies from fixed wing and rotary wing flight dynamics without the negative effects of each. For example aircrafts do not typically take off vertically, and helicopters do not distinguish between lift and thrust, which gives margins of inefficiency in ranged performance. This proposed concept compromises and improves the two traditions. The use of redundant flight vehicles and minor fabrication to existing technologies does not provide a leap in thought and human expectation. It is time for a new paradigm in flight vehicles and we are here to do that and alter the expectation of what a flight vehicle consists of.

Founded in the southeast in 2013, NetSanity offers a SaaS based secure consumer service for mobile devices. Initially focusing on consumers, we provide secure content filtering services for Apple mobile devices, including the iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. We offer parents a way to remotely monitor and control access to their children's internet and internet-enabled apps. Unlike safe browsers, or app-based content filtering, NetSanity uses a new and revolutionary way to remotely control access without having physical access to the child's enrolled device. Featuring our suite of "blockers", a NetSanity mobile user (typically a parent) can block inappropriate apps remotely; prevent the internet during non approved times using a scheduler; block all Internet with the press of a button; and more. Later phases include support for Android mobile devices, as well as Apple desktops, using the same unified cloud. With many billions of Apple mobile devices deployed, and the need for parents to have a simple platform to manage their child's content, NetSanity is uniquely positioned for global growth.

Future enhancements and upgrades will allow the ability to offer secure IP communications of email and other traffic for parents who are cautious about having their content read or sniffed by unscrupulous sources.

We bring clarity to healthcare by bringing four things together:
* Video and other media as evidence 
* Evaluation form as part of EMR
* Secure delivery of the content using the Cloud
* Use of mobile and wearable devices to record data.

Go Eval is a software mobile / cloud application that allows users to take videos while evaluating their patients. They can then securely deliver the results to insurance companies using a unique encounter ID and Password for each patient or encounter. They  can even make their own evaluation form or choose from our template library. 
Go Eval uses industry standard encryption for data security and can even be used in other fields, like real estate, autos, business, and even the legal industry.

* You can Take a video on YouTube and send a link to the insurance company to prove your point But Thats not secure, nor can you take multiple videos, photos, have questions and answers.
* You can fill out evaluation forms on your EMR / Patient Management Software and even attach videos and photos but can’t send it to third parties securely.
* You can have software which you can make form templates and print or save PDFs once you have filled it while evaluation patients, but there is no way to deliver it to third party with attached video.

GoEval seamlessly integrates all this in a secure environment with an intuitive mobile and cloud application.

Our mission is to help physical therapy patients recover more effectively by providing their doctors with cross-platform home-exercise software combined with a remote telehealth service to drive unparalleled engagement to home exercise programs.

Business Summary:  In the multi-billion dollar waste disposal & cleaning industry, our focus is the production & distribution of absorbents & cleaning products that work exceedingly better than the competition.  Our 1st brand is GreenSorb, which absorbs all fuels, all oils, paints, solvents, bodily fluids, food products, and numerous others.  The market is huge and the competition beyond the market leading brand is fragmented.  GreenSorb is sold through large distributors that sell to thousands of dealers across the US market.  We plan expand our product line to include “best-of-breed” environmentally oriented cleaning products in 2014.   	Customer Problem:  Safe disposal of waste is a growing expense.  The U.S. EPA is increasing its inspections of businesses and levying fines for improper waste disposal.  The market leading product has been used for decades, but it’s an old solution.  There is no "front-running" Green product/brand in the market today.   	Target Market:  Aerospace, Environmental Services, Chemical, Industrial, Oil & Gas, Janitorial-Sanitation (Jan-San), Home-Recreation, Automotive – Commercial Fleet, Office Facilities, and Government (DOD), HAZMAT, Municipalities.   	Sales & Marketing Strategy:  Focused effort in specific, high-return target markets.  Recruit large distributors, dealer networks, large customers, & REP groups in multiple industries and allow those companies to sell to their customers.   	Business Model:  Build a large customer base of repeat users by market segment that purchase through industry-known distribution-dealer channels.  Our gross margins range from 30-60% based on .   	Use of Funds:  Our concept is proven and we have sales - now we need to increase our customer base to maximize revenues.  We plan to increase sales, marketing & advertising expense in targeted markets.   	Competitive Advantage:  Our products work better... for a lower-cost-per-use.  They reduce downstream waste, which is a significant savings for customers.

Cryptocurrency is a growing industry with untapped potential and room for exponential growth. Early adapters will reap larger benefits for taking on risk, and due to the nature of cryptocurrency these risk can be reduced making them comparable to traditional start-up investments. Cryptocurrency is set to take the place of acquirers such as Paypal as well as an alternative to debt cards. They make transferring money easy, fast and free. More importantly, it insures users the privacy and control of their own money. Unlike Paypal and credit cards, there is no such thing as a charge back and your wallet can not be frozen. Miners operate much like acquirers only no fee is charged. Instead miners are rewarded coins for their work. This is how new coins are generated and what CoinHoldings desires to do on a large scale. Most miners have small operations in their house, making a few coins every day. CoinHoldings is seeking to set up a large mining operation known as a mining farm in order to take advantage of the low coin difficulty and gain a large share in different altcoins. Because altcoins are new, those with the most coins have the power to influence the market. Rather then leaving that in the hands of others, CoinHoldings will produce enough hashing power to generate enough coins in order that we might provide weight for more volatile coins. By using multipool algorithms, smart selling strategies and low energy cost, CoinHoldings is seeking to give investors a significant return on investment in a short period while avoiding unnecessary risk.

Hathaway Renewable Energy (HRE) is undertaking a project that has a cellulosic bio diesel refinery and clean electricity plant that make synergistic use of the feedstock (railroad cross ties and municipal solid waste).   Legacy technologies are being employed in a manner that lessens the technology risk. Use of railroad cross ties and municipal solid waste avoids the risk associated with using commodities based feedstock such as corn or soy beans.  AECOM is currently conducting the FEED/FEP3 studies as the EPC.

Off takers for the bio diesel are Marathon Oil and CountryMark.  Duke Energy of Indiana is the off taker for the electricity.  Term sheets are now being negotiated for contractual agreements.  Duke is involved with HRE for the final site selection.

Wyutex Oil & Gas, LLC is a privately held upstream oil and gas company. The strategy of the company is to acquire an appropriate field with operations that provides current production and revenue. It should provide upside to the company with offset and infield drilling as well as efficient operational management thus reducing the risk of drilling and maximizing the production of the existing wells. The long-term strategy of the company is to deliver a publicly-traded company with long-term production and reserve growth by building a performance driven energy portfolio. The company’s strategy is achieved through a balance of oil and gas plays with downside hedges and upside price appreciation, vertical integration of services to positively impact bottom line revenue.   	Central to the plan of Wyutex is the acquisition and implementation of its investor strategy.  Exploration and development of energy resources is defined by risk.  Wyutex's strategy is simple and well defined in order to limit the risk involved.  First, provide investors in the company with security of their investment while providing a return.  Second, operate the field efficiently to maximize profits.  Third, establish a network of broker dealer relationships to offer participation in the company's drilling program.  Fourth, allow, at the option of the investor, the opportunity to convert their debt position in the acquired field into a position of equity based on the valuation of the operating company's financials.   	By implementing this plan, Wyutex will be given the opportunity to operate and development the company's resources while the investors will have a secure investment with positive returns and have the opportunity to participate in the significant equity upside of a pre-publically traded upstream oil and gas company.

Our competition have consistently failed in at least one of these critical areas. Many customers of other mail order pharmacies are frustrated by this and are seeking an alternative.  We are the better alternative. We will employ direct call to action advertising to educate consumers about the service we provide. Being a mail order pharmacy allows us to have a much larger catchment area and greater efficiency since we can service many more patients from one location than a regular brick and mortar pharmacy. We intend to focus on the sate of Texas initially and then expand to the rest of the United States.  Upon opening we will have the legal capability to serve all of Texas, Pennsylvania, Georgia and Massachusetts. We are only limited by our ability to process and fulfill prescription orders.  This is a very sound investment for an investor that would like to invest in a business with high profit potential.

The phenomenal growth of our senior population coupled with their overwhelming desire to remain independent in their homes has created an immediate need for people, products and services that can help achieve that goal. The nation’s population of people 65 and older is expected to slightly more than double, to 86 million from 41 million in 2010. Of that increase, the 85 and older is the fastest growing segment. According to an AARP survey nearly ninety percent (90%) of those over 65 want to stay in their residences for as long as possible, and eighty percent (80%) say they believe their current home is where they will always live. Caregiving is one of the fastest growing employment sectors and tele-health  has a large focus on monitoring the senior population in their homes. US News 100 Best Jobs for 2014 includes nearly forty percent (40%) of the picks in the health care industry.  Monitor My Meds   know known as Stay Independent  provides easy to use and inexpensive tools for caregivers to help seniors remain independent.The caregivers are home care, geriatric care managers, senior independent living communities, hospital discharge and family caregivers.  Most of these markets are B to B except the market for family caregivers.Stay Independent is a sophisticated care management platform that links caregivers and seniors,  including family, and monitors the independence of their client/patient. At its simplest level the platform provides personal communication messaging to and from the senior by telephone, cellular or analogue, requiring no equipment, installation, training or internet access on the part of the senior being cared for. It also provides a secured account where healthcare professionals, caregivers and family members can share information through notes and adherence charts.  The service is used as an introductory service by home care and senior communities to distinguish their service offereings. .

PIPR_Name: Hacking the President Film Partners, LLP
PIPR_Description: Fund this movie and you'll appear in the book!   	 Hacking the President is a new historical fiction adventure thriller by author Edward Ben-Alec, available now on Amazon.  The 54th President of the United States, once an adopted Chinese orphan, is elected after a constitutional amendment.  What nobody knows including the President is that when she was a baby, she received implanted biotechnology for controlling her in the future.  Less than 24 hours into her presidency she is overwhelmed with commands to unleash hellish weapons on the American people by Chinese scientists who've been planning this for 40 years.  Scenes of American immigration from every corner of the Earth are interwoven through time - telling a riveting love story that takes places over a thousand generations.  All of this lays the groundwork for an epic battle and adventurous quest to dominate and control the President's very soul.   	 When it was written Hacking the President was designed as a movie and a great, enthralling movie it will be.  But first it has to get made.  Just a minor little detail that we will dispense with now, with your help.

Market Opportunity

Global market exceeds $6 billion USD annually for the Empower2adapt (E2a) enterprise web app that makes use of big data analytics to solve business leader’s most complex challenges - effective strategies, effective systems and an effective culture. To extend their Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) and reduce their Customer Acquisition Costs (CAC), global business consultants sell E2a’s web app directly to their clients. With lifetime customers, consultants can better serve their clients - reinventing product & service offerings (innovation), organizational culture, systems & infrastructure, business processes, and people (workforce) to optimize performance and customer outcomes.

Value Proposition, and Domain Knowledge

Empower2adapt is the only Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) that makes use of big data analytics to empower business leaders and business consultants with the information they need to maintain effective strategies, effective systems and an effective culture to optimize performance and customer outcomes.

Customers

U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) with more than 760,000 civilian employees; the Defense Health Agency (DHA) with more than 137,000 employees, and the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), with more than 340,000 employees - representing $80M in annual revenue.

E2a plans to implement a Value-Added Reseller (VAR) program for global business consultants to sell E2a enterprise web app directly to their clients.

Competition

E2a maintains the philosophy of partnering with your competition.  E2a will implement a marketing campaign that attracts competitors to its VAR program.  Competitors will sell E2a enterprise web apps directly to their clients - to extend customer lifetime value while reducing customer acquisition costs. Competitors include, but are not limited to Workday, PeopleSoft, Peoplefluent, SAP, SuccessFactors, Oracle, IBM, Accenture, PWC, Deloitte, KPMG, Boston Consulting Group, Booz Allen Hamilton, etc.

Activation Solutions is a new startup company that intends to provide software publishers a flexible DRM service called @ctivate™. The @ctivate product is a fast, easy, reliable and cost effective solution for software publishers, giving them the ability to implement anti-piracy, copy protection and software activation into their software products, giving them a high level of security and protection against illegal software copying and distribution. This also ensures that each copy of their digital product is used in compliance with their license terms and that is not shared or used simultaneously on more than one computer. The @ctivate product supports both Windows and Macintosh OSX applications and provides publishers with powerful reporting, detailed statistics, automatic license key management and reseller administration. Femonoe helps you have your content constantly updated using social media resources.

What problem are we solving?
Constantly updated material around a subject, identify what is currently trending in various social media networks and in news websites or blogs based on specific keywords/topics while filtering results by language. We help companies/digital agencies, bloggers boost their content curation strategy.

Product Description
Femonoe retrieves, indexes and searches big data sets from social media to provide you with accurate results quickly and efficiently. Femonoe can help you boost your content curation strategy using thematic searches in supported social media and news networks around a subject. A thematic search is formed using keywords, both positive and negative, and retrieves content that can be sorted based on keyword relevance, popularity and retrieval date while filtered by language. The output can be viewed on Femonoe’s backend but can also be embedded on any web site.

Why We Started This Company  	  Both founders have loved ones who’ve been victims of domestic violence and/or violent assaults. These events have personally impacted our lives. With the creation of the smartphone and advancements in technology we developed MyForce as unique personal security service that protects our members and provides them and their family's peace of mind.     Today we protect a broad demographic consisting of both men and women ranging from 8 to 81 years of age.   What Sets Us Apart  	  MyForce is easy to use with a simple interface allowing users to discreetly notify a professionally trained, UL listed, CSAA 5-Diamond certified alarm monitoring center. In addition, our service is easily integrated with college and university campus security programs – allowing campus law enforcement to receive and respond to on campus alerts. MyForce has already been integrated on ten campuses nationwide.   Our Keys To Success  	  Our key to success is scaling and introducing our service to a much larger audience, which will require additional capital.    The MyForce service is already supported on 10 campuses nationwide; with planned roll-outs scheduled for fall of 2014. We’re in active conversations with multiple large channel partners including a larger national insurance provider and wireless carrier.    Through a pilot marketing program we’ve successfully proven the demand and need for our service.

A few months ago, I was trading very actively and letting my brother and a select group of friends know what I was doing. . My brother, Larry, who is a professional trader, was doing the same thing not only with his equity trades but also with is FX and futures trades. Larry also writes a newsletter that he distributes to about 50 people. He lets his subscribers know what he is doing as well. This is all very manual and this practice has us typing multiple emails during the course of a trading day.  When the market closed I called my brother and said ”man I wish I could let all of my friends know about my trades as soon as my order was executed. I wish there was a way to connect my electronic trade ticket to an email”..  The application would allow traders to send an email to a pre-determined and pre-populated list as soon as they execute a trade. So for example a client of TD Ameritrade could place an order and as it is executed an email goes out to his select group he chooses to let know his trade has occurred. Maybe it is members of his investment club or others in his IBD Meet Up group.  Prop traders could let their colleagues across the room or across the globe know what they have just traded. The application could have compliance uses as well. This would allow compliance officers to keep tabs on certain brokers or traders in their firm when they travel for example. Money managers or financial advisors could let their clients know in real time what they have bought or sold. Small (non-market moving hedge funds) could, if they choose to let their investors know that they have just bought, sold, hedged, or shorted.  In addition this could be used across all asset classes, futures, equities, options, currencies, fixed income and firms globally could be targets.

ChirpVision enables multi-channel live stream over WiFi at sporting and music events. Features include real time live video with multiple camera angles, DVR features, Highlights, Ad insertion, Data Capture, Analytics tracking, in-app social stream, Video on Demand and more. Streaming in dense crowds is difficult but ChirpVision solves that with patented video compression technology, forward error correction and noise concealment. As a result, ChirpVision only uses 20% of bandwidth required by any other technology. ChirpVision software can be licensed by any sports team or event promoter on a per use basis. ChirpVision can also stream outside the venues to viewers on a pay per view or free basis.

Rough Cut Films is an independent feature film company dedicated to producing appealing and original films. Rough Cut Films consists of two professionals who pride themselves on their ability to create inventive and inspired material and to attract creative collaborators with an authentic voice. We also partner with other production companies to develop and produce projects across a wide range of genres.   	Rough Cut Films is a young company with a firm understanding of popular, classic, counter, urban, youth, and world cultures; and we bring that interest into each of our projects. We recognize the current creative imperative that is driving the paradigm shift away from large studios producing the most relevant films. This allows Rough Cut Films as an independent production company the unique opportunity to fill the content gap and focus on making movies with a "big studio" look for very low budgets.   	Based in Chicago, Rough Cut Films was initially created to produce the film DEAD GIRLS [©2014], with scheduled  release in November 2014. That film was financed through our close personal and business network, and now we are moving forward towards making more macro- and low budget features through more traditional financial streams. We make genre films. While the big studios continue to adapt features from other media, the realist is that most of the time, movies with smaller budgets provide small and medium sized production studios with the most bang for their buck. Typical genres include: horror, thriller, action, comedy, and crime films.   	Whether focusing on films that highlight various social and cultural issues, or through producing the most lucrative genre projects for the commercial market, the principals at Rough Cut Films use their experience, determination, and innovative spirit to produce engaging material. These tenets are what makes Rough Cut Films a new and important voice in independent entertainment that reaches beyond the boundaries of tradition.

Amiare LLC, through a patented pyrolysis technology, produces  a universal paraffin dispersant which is utilized in the oil and gas industry for enhanced oil recovery and tank bottom cleaning.  Amiare uses discarded, recycled tires as its feed stock to create this unique product, which dissolves paraffins and asphaltenes, and prevents the aggregation of these molecules.  This dispersal characteristic reduces the viscosity of the oil, thereby increasing the production of existing oil and gas wells by percentages of 100% to over 700%.  In treatment of solid tank bottoms, our product liquefies the solidified bottom and allows the bottom to be converted into a marketable crude oil.

Davis  Medical Holdings (DMH) is a sole-source minority black owend business provider and private-label manufacturing and distributor of disposable medical supplies, hygiene tissues , plastics bags, pharmaceutical and consumable medical and textiles, skin-care products, and therapeutic bedding products to hospitals, independent physician associations, group purchasing organizations (GPO) accountable care organizations (ACO), integrated delivery network IDN),  large retail outlets, and federal agencies( through minority set-side sole source programs.   	30 % of patients and corresponding revenues are obtained through minorities in the healthcare field. Less than one tenth of one percent (0.1%) is spent with minority owned firms-including manufacturing and distribution . Federal mandates require hospitals, managed care providers that receive federal funding, to direct up to 30% of their purchases to certified minority owned companies. Currently, less than 1% of all purchases are directed to “certified” minority owned businesses due to deficiencies in providing a total purchasing solution. Healthcare organizations receiving grants or bond support are federally required by law to demonstrate what they are allocating a percentage of their purchases to minority business enterprises (MBEs). Hospitals that receive federal dollars are mandated to do business with diverse suppliers per title 13, volume 1, part 143   	Federal, state, and local contracts represent huge opportunities for the company.Many public sector entities have sole source and set-side programs in the healthcare market. As the nation's only minority private label company offering disposable medical products, DMH will experience a significant boom in: GPOs, ACOs, Urgent Care Centers, INDs, Long Term Care Centers, Health and Human Services, DOD, VA etc. representing enormous growth opportunities for the firm.

SmashChart is a user based Top 40 music chart app with a twist.  Rather then vote for the songs you like, with SmashChart you "Smash" the songs you don't like.  In theory, the song that is smashed the least amount of times is a true representation of the most popular song, thus creating a number one spot on the SmashChart.  With daily and weekly results, you wont look any where else for a true Top 40 music charts.

EStartAcademy.com will be the predominant provider of practical online entrepreneurial education in the United States and around the world.  By providing interactive video training, entrepreneurs will gain valuable, action-focused knowledge that can immediately help them start, run, and/or grow their businesses.   	  The entrepreneurial spirit is alive and well in the United States and around the world.  Sadly, however, this spirit is restrained by a lack of readily available, affordable education for entrepreneurs.  Existing and aspiring business owners can muddle through hundreds of thousands of books on various topics, or they can spend hundreds of thousands of dollars getting an MBA or other business degree - one that may or may not prepare them for the everyday demands and challenges of starting, running, marketing, financing, and growing a business.   	  EStartAcademy.com recognizes the void of entrepreneurial education available in a one stop shop.  Similarly, the Company also realizes that not all business owners are created equally.  Some have absolutely no fundamental business knowledge, while others are fairly proficient at many aspects of running a business, but they lack only certain skill sets, or wish to enhance their existing knowledge on a particular subject.  That's why eStartAcademy will offer Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced level courses on most topics, including: starting a business, financing a business, marketing, operations, management, website development, business plan development, negotiations, law, and a variety of other topics.

I'm a seasoned real estate investor with a "minor" in gentlemen's club operations. I'm merging the two talents and looking to create a small empire of actual gentlemen's clubs in strategic locations beginning in New York. None of the investments will be lease-hold clubs....all will be equitable real estate with an attached gentlemen's club that will be turned into an efficient revenue machine. The goal is to create "double-threats", or equity strong real estate with a consistant revenue stream boasting a 35-45% annual profit margin for long term viability  while building a brand and reputation on the way. Gentlemen's clubs are mathematically consistant, almost recession proof, and predictable from a projection standpoint as long as you are able to read and adapt the golden rules to the club's current surroundings. Each club has a numerical ($) annual gross capacity which is given to you by the fire marshall in the form of the maximum patron capacity....It's that clear and much easier to obtain than operators make it look.  The ultimate business goal is to create a high class "chain" in desireable geographical surroundings and focus on maintaining a steadfast commitment to keeping revenues at club capacity and meanwhile compounding smart real estate equity. It's very similar to the approach of Rick's Cabaret uses but on a much smaller per investment goal. Instead of looking for 15,000 square feet in Manhattan for 10Mil minimum, I'd target surrounding areas with 50,000 plus cars per week traffic flow, median incomes, real estate market stability, and initially target gross investments to full operation at under 3Mil....there are plenty of deals out there right now that are at  60% or less PTV, with equity there for the taking .Alot of these already have a 500k+ revenue streams. How many other business/real estate combos can you think of with all these safety and upside attributes?? Lose the words "titty bar" or "strip club"....let's  re-create the Gentlemen's Club.

The StoreGenie marketing platform and CRM delivers the long desired one-to-one to marketing capability that individual brick and mortar retail stores and chains need to compete with e-commerce.

StoreGenie is based on the insight that every time a shopper interacts with a retail sales associate, the sales associate learns highly detailed information about the shopper’s preferences and interests but currently this information is lost as soon as the shopper leaves. 

With StoreGenie, in a matter of seconds, sales associates use their mobile device or other input devices to permanently capture everything just learned about the shopper during their interaction. 

The result is a mailing list that is organized by shared preferences and interests and enables highly targeted and relevant text and e-mail messages to as few as a single recipient and drives traffic to both the web and the retail store.

StoreGenie has tested a beta version and is preparing to launch the commercial version.

The company product can be seen at Rollewall.com. It creates the beauty of wallpaper w/o paper. It uses ordinary paint and completes an entire room in 2 hours. Rollerwall is better than wallpaper because it cannot peel or tear, there are no seams, and it never needs to be steamed off. Repaint and it's gone. It even works on surfaces that cannot be wallpapered such as textured walls, stucco, cinder block. furniture, fabric, floors and more.      It works like this: The first part is a 6 inch rollers with a design embossed on the surface. We have 325 beautiful designs and the ability to make more at a small cost. The second part is an applicator that  holds 1 or 2 colors of paint. The painting process is easy. Start each wall in any corner, allow each pass to slightly overlap the previous pass, add more paint to the applicator after every few passes, and go!       The business plan is to open a retail store in a mall so people can see the beautiful results. Some people will buy the product and do it themselves. Others will hire one of our licensed painting contractors to do the work. Once this business is shown to work in one mall, it can be franchised and expanded to thousands of malls around the world.      Our design rollers are made in the USA.  We are the only manufacturer in the Americas and plan to stay that way because we use special equipment and trade secret technology. We can even make custom designs at a modest cost. There is a source in China, but Chinese rollers are glued together from two parts which leaves seams and limits their designs.   Our design rollers are completely seamless.
