NII has begun the development of our patented Optical Ultrasound Tomography™ (OUT) medical camera. The OUT camera will detect and isolate bleeding in the brain in real-time, non-invasively, without contact, and without radiation. The handheld OUT camera will transmit the images to a waiting neurosurgeon or hospital and be available in ambulances worldwide.

Biodico is one of the oldest and most experienced biofuel companies in the world.  Biodico  has worked with the U.S. Navy and the California Energy Commission (CEC) to develop advanced biofuel technologies. Biodico signed its first Cooperative Research And Development Agreement (CRADA) with the Navy in 2002 and just expanded that agreement in July of 2015.  

The technologies which Biodico has developed are ready for commercialization and include (1) feedstocks (algae, jatropha, brassicas and others), (2) process control (the use of automation, remote sensing, Fourier Transform Near Infrared and Wave Guided Radar), and (3) a distributed neural network for centralized command, control and support for decentralized facilities.  Biodico's technology is uniquely suited for multiple feedstocks, fast and inexpensive modular construction and deployment, enhanced throughput with reduced operating costs, and increased monetization of renewable fuel and energy incentives. 

 BI has built, operated and sold several biodiesel plants over the years both domestically and internationally as well as worked with government leaders  in drafting legislation and regulations that help promote biofuels..

BI is now raising pre-IPO funding for the purpose of building, owning and operating 9 new biofuel production facilities. The first plant (18 MGPY) is coming online in August 2015 with the second in the first quarter of 2016, leading to a NASDAQ IPO by the end of 2016.

CHEC PR has developed orally available peptide compounds for cell degeneration due to inflammation, oxidative stress or protein aggregation. The goal of the organization is to extend a large volume of animal data, showing excellent efficacy in neurodegenerative models, to the modeled human diseases. Possible lead indications for which there are proof of concept data: Multiple Sclerosis, Alzheimer’s and/or Parkinson’s Disease, Central Nervous System Injuries, and Seizure Disorders. There is very limited industry progress for the above indications. The current treatments for MS relapse are by injection with no long term benefit for neurodegeneration and disability and highly variable safety profiles.  No combined anti-inflammatory or aggregate disposal therapies are presently available for neurodegenerative disorders like Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s, or Huntington’s diseases.   CHECs are unique because they target all the principal cellular pathologies in degenerative diseases (inflammation, cell death, protein aggregation) in an orally available formulation.   	Company advisors are Timothy Cunningham, Ph.D., who discovered and isolated the compounds, and Jeffrey Greenstein, M.D., who is a neurologist/immunologist that will supervise clinical applications. The peptides  are protected  by issued US patents and several patent applications.   	 CHEC PR takes a flexible position for selection of initial lead indication and for equity sharing. Accommodating investor interest and needs in this way is expected to expedite capitalization and clinical development,   	Key Milestones:  - Selection of lead indication - IND enablement thru Phase I   	Summary: CHEC PR has a highly qualified team of advisors that have developed these novel peptide therapeutics  with potential is in several multi-billion dollar markets. The peptide is orally available, CNS penetrant, with no demonstrated safety concerns .

The objective of Circle Commerce Manager is to manage every aspect of the product and data flow necessary to fully process orders - that's why it's called order management software! But to do that, the system must provide support for a wide variety of functions - full call center/customer service/CRM support, forecasting and purchasing, product information management (PIM, interfaced to the channels), inventory management, warehouse management, a full accounting suite that is 100% integrated, extensive web services to handle a variety of interfaces - the list goes on and on.   	So, our order management software does far more than "just" manage orders - it's the information hub that drives your business. But what makes Circle Commerce Manager unique is that it is the only package in the industry that can be readily adapted to each and every specific need that a company may have. In short, CCM is fully customizable and was built to be that way from the very beginning.   	Circle Commerce products are based on technology and business practices that have evolved over two decades. The continual refinement of the process, and continual introduction of current technology, has resulted in a business/technology "ecosystem" that surpasses any other offering on the market. Our order management software design is elegantly simple in nature, yet delivers more breadth of function, speed, and flexibility than any competitive offering in the Order Management Systems market, leveraging the best of today's technology.

~  Shooting in Georgia (Savannah), using pre-sold 30% film incentive tax credits to supplement equity. Savannah offers excellent support opportunities based on personal relationships of MTP's principals, Savannah natives with numerous contacts in the area.

~  Employing a production staff dedicated to the success of the picture, working for less than standard rates.

~  Employing as yet “undiscovered” but superb talent, so as to produce an exceptional film at lower overall cast cost. “Great films makes stars—not the other way around.”

~  Shooting on one of several digital film platforms that have allowed independent filmmakers the ability to produce studio-quality films at a fraction of the cost.

Arithmetici partners Harvard graduates, university professors, and conservatory-trained performance artists to develop software that teaches fundamental concepts in math and science through adaptive testing, neuroscience-backed drills, animated lectures, and educational video games, opening students to the very best instruction available, no matter what the limitations may be of their particular place.   	Arithmetici targets mostly students ages 11 – 22, with particular early emphasis on U.S. students ages 11 – 16. Part of the company’s marketing strategy will be not only to capture a segment of the current market in educational apps, but also to convince the much broader market of families both here and in Asia and Latin America that are willing to invest on their children’s academic achievement to trust new ways of learning.   	Because the new generation of student is uniquely conversant with the newest technologies in personal computing, and is by consequence uniquely sensitive to style in multimedia, Arithmetici understands and exploits the full range of available technology, and aims to rise to the standard of film in production and entertainment quality.   	Arithmetici employs adaptive algorithms designed around the very latest findings in neuroscience regarding attention and retention to adapt to a student’s progress, spacing the timing of introducing and recapitulating material based on a student’s unique performance data.

As part of our commitment to help ensure global and US food security, Falcon Isle Resources has identified a major high quality phosphate resource in the Diamond Creek Phosphate Operations.  This rich deposit on 840 acres will contribute essential mineral elements to the downstream production of high demand fertilizers such as DAP, MAP and Superphosphate, products necessary to meet rising agricultural demand.  Our high-grade phosphate ore has been tested and identified as a major source of organic direct application fertilizer to help meet the growing demand for organic foods in the US.   	To date, initial sample testing has confirmed Diamond Creek’s high grade phosphate ore averaging over 28% P205 with estimated surface and underground resources of over 15,000,000 tons. Continued exploration activity and a pre-feasibility study will be conducted to establish probable resource quantities, qualities and location.  These studies will be the basis to determine mine plan design and extraction activity moving forward.   	Initial Plan of Operations have outlined Phase I strip mining to extract approximately 3,880,000 tons of high grade phosphate ore, averaging over 28% P205. The Diamond Creek Phosphate Mine is strategically located in mining friendly Utah and near multiple major downstream processing and fertilizer manufacturing facilities.

We are committed to creating regenerative medicine to alleviate diseases caused by cellular degeneration and genetic disorders.  We focus on aging, as this is the common root of most major diseases.   	We bring these treatments to the clinic for both compassionate and consensual use and to change how we treat disease in the future.

Shades of Green LLC will be a Cooperative as defined in California law. We are a dispensary that develops, manufactures, grows and distributes innovative products to our store front for consumption by the defined general public. We offer delivery services; edibles and tinctures as well as medical marijuana. The Shades of Green model is being developed for the creation of a store in Monterey, CA. This profile will then be replicated in other locations throughout the state of CA.

Overview 
When AT&T acquired Cricket Wireless in 2014 it virtually doubled Cricket's coverage area. This network expansion has created virgin territories where there is little competition for prepaid wireless services. Progressive Wireless was formed to open 100 Cricket Wireless stores as quickly as possible. Cricket's dealer program provides excellent activation commissions, lifetime residuals and great margins on accessories.

Franchise Like Risk Reduction
There is a reason that 90-95% of franchises succeed. They are based on a long track record of success. There are currently over 3,300 Cricket stores in the U.S. and the parent company was started 15 years ago. As a Cricket dealer, we benefit from many franchise characteristics such as training programs, strong brand and corporate marketing assistance, increased purchasing power, operational support, location and construction assistance etc. Best of all Cricket does not charge a franchise fee.

Management Team
The Company's President was recruited by Cricket Wireless after recently selling his exceptionally run 34-store Sprint dealership. He has an MBA and over 16 years of experience in the wireless industry. Between the officers and board members, the team has over 40 years combined experience in the wireless industry and over a century of business management experience.

Market
The prepaid wireless market segment is large and growing. In the first quarter of 2013 new wireless customers chose prepaid plans 10 to 1 over contract plans. As of 2012 there were 100 million prepaid subscriptions in the U.S. Smartphone sales on prepaid networks doubled from 2012 to 2013 with nearly one third of all smart phones currently on prepaid plans.

Conclusion & Projected Returns
Projections show a 47% average annual cash return over 5 yrs with nearly a 500% ROI assuming a sale or IPO in the fifth year. We are selling 20% of the company for  $25k minimum investment. 15 founders units available.

Swingbyte has developed a bluetooth-enabled device that allows golfers to put all of the data of their golf swing right in the palm of their hand. Our next product, scheduled to launch in the next couple of months, uses a machine learning algorithm to take that data and provide its users very personal, actionable, and measurable insights that allow them to improve their golf game anywhere and anytime they want.   	The next step for our company is to take the technology we developed for golf and apply it to other wearable markets. Today, these other wearables provide data but give little, or no, insight into how users can use that data effectively. Our machine learning algorithm can be applied to any motion to improve technique and prevent injury, making wearables useful tools for all users.

The foundation of Horsemen's values and business practices are built on providing our Clients with the best product, value and service experience. Our people are here to serve and earn your trust case by case and we believe the best way to achieve this outcome is by consistently demonstrating our dedication to your success and complete satisfaction. Behind the scenes, you’ll find over 100 energetic employees, with one singular focus – exceeding your expectations!

Longview’s Unique Positions

•	Longview enables a “plug and play” environment for licensed growers where growers need to supply only the agricultural material and expertise. 

•	Business plan allows for establishment of facilities in multiple states, an option often foreclosed to businesses involved in the legal agricultural marijuana space. 

•	Management team currently targeting distressed industrial and commercial real estate with potential to be converted into indoor and outdoor cultivation facilities. 

•	Currently focused on projects with significant buy-in from local municipalities in order to mitigate zoning issues. 

•	Company’s regulatory exposure is limited by working only with state licensed growers and avoiding direct engagement in regulated activities (“never touch the bud”)

•	Target clientele of growers is primarily focused on agricultural expertise and typically in need of professional managerial and other ancillary services to operate a successful business – significant opportunity to provide additional follow-on services to growers including security, accounting, management consulting, etc. 

•	Significant profit generated by sales of marijuana oil (used in edibles and vapor devices) provides Longview with the opportunity to increase revenues by offering to lease or rent extracting equipment in addition to basic horticulture equipment.

Univesity Beyond is a job board and management platform for campus ambassador programs. UB provides employers access to the on-site job board to recruit ambassadors, and a dashboard for task management, communication, and compensation.

Online shoe sales is a more than 10 billion dollar industry. Returns are often as buyers are unable to try the shoes on. Our 3D virtual shoe fitting technology fixes that problem. It reduces the return rate, increases online shoe stores' profit and saves shoe buyers a lot of time.   	This is state of art technology. Online shoe stores will fight for getting this deployed to their site first. It is a great investment opportunity for you. Let's talk.

Pillar originated two loans in November 2014 in connection with the Property: a mezzanine loan in the amount of $1,400,000 (the “Loan”) and a senior loan in the amount of $10,700,000 (the “Senior Loan”).  The borrower used the proceeds of the Loan and the Senior Loan to acquire and fund certain improvements in Racquet Club Apartments, a multifamily apartment complex located in Lancaster, California. The acquisition price was $12,950,000.
Purpose: Mezzanine Loan Participation in Racquet Club Apartments

The draft contract and associated transaction agreements can be reviewed in the ‘Supporting Documents’ tab of the Offering Page and/or are available upon request. The subject property is comprised of two contiguous buildings containing 47 residential units located at 73 – 75 East 3rd Street in the East Village neighborhood of Manhattan, New York.

EVELO produces and distributes a line of beautiful, efficient and smart electric bicycles that make cycling accessible to everyone.   	With a direct-to-consumer distribution model and a growing network of Ambassadors (existing customers), EVELO has started on the ground floor of a new industry and is growing quickly ($1.05M in revenue over the last 6 months; 86% revenue growth in 2014 over 2013).   	Our customers range from commuters to baby boomers to families and everybody in between. The electric bicycle opens up opportunities to become more active, spend time outdoors, and go further and faster.   	When riding one of EVELO electric bicycles, it makes hills feel flat and distances shrink, so you can cycle just about anywhere regardless of age, fitness levels or terrain.   	To see our line of products in action, check out http://www.evelo.com and http://omni.evelo.com. To see what our customers have to say about us, take a look at http://www.shopperapproved.com/reviews/evelo.com/

TextUs offers a new way to increase business communication response rates by up to 800%, vs. emails and phone calls, by providing powerful text messaging tools and allowing our customers to waste less time and close more deals!

TextUs is pioneering the first business text messaging platform providing personal, two-way, text messaging.  By leveraging the business’ existing landline phone numbers to send and receive texts. TextUs is the natural and technological evolution of business text messaging by breaking away from impersonal, robotic, 5-digit, short-codes and harnessing the capability of the 23,000,000, landlines and 800 #s, that businesses in North America already own and use everyday.

Guided by relentless focus on shareholder value and requirements to achieve our vision, Agorana Media Corp. will constantly strive to deliver operational excellence and adapt to the ever-changing market conditions and implement initiatives to meet shareholder expectations. Agorana will achieve goals by focusing on bottom line results through formulating and implementing solid business concepts, striking marketing strategies and detailed plans. Superior financial performance as well as our mid- and long-term strategies will be molded by our core values that are shared by all members of the team. A listing at a public exchange within 12 months after start of operations will ensure that shareholders will be provided with a solid exit strategy.

Agorana is targeting the mobile app market with its innovative and appealing mobile gaming and mobile business products. Our products are self-professed to meet the expectations of our customers. Fulfilling all requirements to become an important player in the mobile app market space, we expect significant growth rates once our products are being launched. Complementary media products, with no competition, will replenish our range of products and generate additional revenue streams. The cross-use of all products will ensure to induce the maximum impact for our advertisement clients.

This is a prefunded purchase & rehab opportunity for a Single Family Residential property in New Jersey. The subject property address is 747 Kingston Road, Princeton, New Jersey.   	The developer is requesting a loan of $944,000 in order to purchase and renovate the underlying property. The property was purchased for a total of $489,900 in August of 2015. There is major renovation needed for the property, totaling $705,000. The borrower will receive 8 draw(s) totaling $944,000 over the course of the loan. The initial draw in the amount of $339,000 occurs when the loan closes. The second draw of $100,000 will be disbursed when demolition, excavation and foundation are complete. The third draw of $100,000 will be disbursed when framing is complete. The fourth draw of $100,000 will be disbursed when windows, doors, roofing, siding, stairs, plumbing and electric are complete. The fifth draw of $100,000 will be disbursed when drywall, flooring and cabinets are complete. The sixth draw of $100,000 will be disbursed when porch, hardware and painting are complete. The seventh draw of $95,000 will be disbursed when driveway and landscaping are complete. The eighth draw of $10,000 will be disbursed when there is evidence of project completion. The borrower will be contributing $100,000 toward the renovation, and this will be at the half way point of the project. The borrower plans to sell in one year or under.   	747 Kingston Road   	Purchase Price: $489,900 	Renovation: $705,000 	After-Rehab Value: $1,450,000   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $1,450,000 for 747 Kingston Road. The ARV ratio is 65.1% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of Princeton is stable and supply and demand are in balance.
Property_Title: Title to Next Phase Development with Patch of Land holding lien position.

PIPR_Description:
HempTech provides a broad range of infrastructure products and services primarily to cannabis growers in states which have passed legislation authorizing this activity. Its products and services can be used in virtually all types of indoor agricultural grow industries. The company delivers either by direct sales to growers or by construction and lease to growers.  HempTech is not directly involved in any aspect of cannabis production or distribution. The company has completed its development stage and is now a start-up company. 

HempTech Corp. was initially established March 1, 2014 in Florida and began its development stage. This involved product research, development, and testing, as well as establishing vendor relations and developing software to integrate the various mechanical components commonly used in grow houses. Now, having completed a scalable suite of products, specifically designed for the cannabis industry but equally applicable to other agricultural pursuits, the company has entered the start-up stage and is launching its business. 

During its development stage, its sister companies invested in and worked on the development and packaging of its various technologies, established trademarks and trade names, hired experienced key personnel, established their sales and marketing strategies, and attended to all other aspects associated with its development stage in preparation launching its business as a start-up.

Zealr was built by a seasoned sales representative who aspired to make sales more efficient and effective in the age of social media. The founder of Zealr recognized that traditional email campaigns were often being ignored. To stand out from the crowd, he knew that marketing and sales processes needed to get in front of their customers, not trail behind in the fray.   	Zealr is dedicated to enabling sales relationships in a new era of communication. Zealr allows individual sales teams the ability to target contacts using the social media channel of their choice. No longer reliant on marketing to provide dated lists or push out generic messages, individual sales reps can leverage their own networks, choosing specific content, contacts, and medium.    	Zealr is fully integrated with most common social media networks and productivity tools to enable efficient and effective workflow. Zealr is able to integrate contacts from address books, first level social media contacts, and CRM databases. With this, users can customize and send marketing messages via email, social media as a status update, group message, blog entry, InMail communication, text, or CRM activity sync.   	Despite its complex integration, Zealr is surprisingly simple to use and leverage. With drag and drop messaging, communication is facile and intuitively organized. Available on Web, mobile, and OS, Zealr enables communication at any time. By linking with SalesForce and other third part reporting technologies, Zealr provides analytics and insight back to sales, marketing, and management in real time.

TireConsumer, LLC is the first price aggregator/price comparison site for the $33 billion North American tire industry.  Using its proprietary software, TireConsumer updates over 1 million prices each week; participating retailers can directly upload customized pricing and manage sales leads.  TireConsumer will provide tire consumers, who conduct 16 million monthly searches, direct access, at no charge, to the best prices for their tires in their local market from their local retailers.  
 
Initially utilizing Google and Facebook to generate traffic, the company expects to reduce cost of customer acquisition through brand building, related PR and customer recommendations, much as the online travel market did 15 years ago.

Revenues will be generated from retailers, who will contract for leads at a rate 40% below current consumer acquisition costs.  TireConsumer does not sell tires, we provide incremental customers to local tire retailers.

Following a successful beta test, TireConsumer will initially focus on major markets within Florida, then enter the Texas market, followed by the California market.  The Company will enter the east coast in the second phase of growth and be in the top 30 metro markets in the US by 2016; major markets within Canada will be entered contemporaneous with this phase.

The Distressed Realty Fund I, LLC will purchase for cash two different kinds of distressed real estate at below market prices that will be repaired and rented or earn interest for the fund. The first kind of distressed real estate will be houses, condos, small apartment / commercial buildings. The second kind of distressed real estate will be tax certificates sold by county treasurers on properties when the property owner didn’t pay their property taxes on time. All purchased tax certificates are recorded in the buyers name as the first lien on the property title. Tax certificates are usually redeemed within a 1, 2 or 3 year time period that is set by each state’s laws.   	The fund estimates it will pay all investors an approximate 1% income check per quarter which is approximately 4% income per year from received rents, earned interest and net profits. Each March 31st, the fund expects to also pay the investors a fifth income check for their 75% share of all net profits from all sold houses/properties during each business year that ends on December 31. The investment capital from sold houses/properties and redeemed tax certificates will be reinvested into other distressed real estate during the 8 to 10 year operating life of the fund.   	The investor can invest their IRA retirement money held in a self directed trust account. The investor can also invest their family trust money, their personal money, and/or their corporate pension money. This offering will raise up to $5,000,000 from accredited investors with a one unit minimum investment amount of $5,000.   	The Distressed Realty Fund 2, LLC management office is located at 3960 Howard Hughes Parkway Suite 500 Las Vegas, Nevada 89169. Mr. David Zussman J.D. is the President & CEO of Realty Fund Management 2, Inc. the managing member of the Distressed Realty Fund 2, LLC. David is a licensed Broker Realtor and Property Manager in Nevada. David is a licensed Real Estate Agent in California. David’s cell is 714-342-0785

Analytically Driven provides best-in-class strategy for identifying, engaging and building  profitable relationships with our clients’ best current and future customers. We use our decades of experience in advising top organizations on increasing  profitable, top-line revenue through organic growth, new customer acquisition, reduction in customer attrition, cross-sell and up-sell, and planned customer attrition. AD develops  new revenue sources for our clients. Analytically Driven creates solutions that are portable across many industries, enables strategies for managing portfolios, hedging investments, evaluating the future performance of talent, and identifying the current and future needs of customers.
Analytically Driven develops solutions that solve complex problems across many industries. We are not a technology company. Our solutions are technology agnostic. We believe technologies come and go, but solutions are lasting. We seek out complex problems that have solutions that can be derived analytically and applied in an effective business context.

Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) therapy is the treatment of choice for Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA) and forms the center of our business model.

CTC's  founder, Doug Hudiburg, began building the conceptual foundation of CTC in January of 2008 while working as a full-time consultant in the industry. After leading the team that launched the IntelliPAP family of CPAP machines, and serving as global product manager, Doug developed and managed a trial business unit which was a first-of-its-kind automated telephone patient follow-up system called DeVilbiss Keystone Services which eventually became CareTouch360, now the leading patient ‘call center’ company in the CPAP supply market. 

In December of 2012, Doug and co-founder D.T. Burns, began working on the CTC project and developing prototype software.  We have built a seasoned software team that has developed and beta-launched two separate CPAP therapy management web applications: CPAP TotalCare and SmartLinkWeb.com  both of which provide unique solutions, improvements, and efficiencies that were previously unavailable to the market.  

We have a working product with active users, and experienced management and development teams.

More than 40 million Americans suffer from sleep apnea while only 25% (about 10 million) have been diagnosed. The $2 billion US market is growing at a rate of approximately 8% annually  fueled by increasing obesity rates, the aging baby boomer population, increased awareness, and diagnosis. It’s a large, growing, and mostly “unconverted” market. 

We believe that our opportunity lies in making current best practices more scalable and profitable through the use of efficient interactive patient follow-up and management technology combined with a comprehensive therapy program. By replacing routine human-powered activities with convenient interactive technology, our platform increases patient satisfaction and adherence to therapy while also increasing revenue and reducing overhead.

Our customers are independent consultants of the in-home party plan industry – a segment of the direct seller’s industry. An industry that has been around almost a century has not changed the fundamental way new people are recruited into the industry or the way they manage and grow their own business. The independent consultant is pretty much on their own to figure it out. Most new recruits aren’t wired to take on this level of “entrepreneurship”. While there are many ways to do this manually, and some technology solutions for some aspects, there’s no integrated or completely automated solution available.
Our product is a custom web-based, mobile optimized, software application that includes several modules to help them manage their contacts, tasks, parties, and business.
IzyTrack is unique in several ways. We’re a very customized software for a very specific niche market. 
We’re the only fully integrated, customized product to this very specialized segment of the market that includes everything they need to operate their business. Once they use IzyTrack, they find it very painful to stay in business without it, because there is no other solution like it, at any price.
We’re laser focused on the 4.5M US consultants, with the 25M Worldwide consultants as our secondary focus. EVERYONE in our target market is part of a team – no one is without a network to share with.

Garage Guys is the world’s first crowdfunded theme park, created with an overarching purpose to create employment opportunities for mentally and physically challenged individuals.  Garage Guys is a family oriented environment with various attractions, located in North Texas.  This is one of the fastest growing economic areas in America, a location which provides Garage Guys with a number of business and occupational growth advantages and developmental opportunities.  
Our strategy is to combine a theme park atmosphere into an automotive industry group in order to develop unique revenue streams that are not ordinarily harnessed in a standalone approach. In all, there will be nine automotive enterprises centered at the foundation of the group (Ford dealership, restoration center, body shop, fabrication shop, machine shop, service center, salvage yard, parts store, and commercial shop) along with 11 entrainment attractions that will focus on family entertainment and recreation (including a hotel, water park, amphitheater, NHRA drag strip, Motocross track, Formula 1 track, Stock-car track, arcade, restaurants, conference building, and art gallery).
Garage Guys business approach provides us the ability to leverage discounts throughout the retail and commercial automotive services and parts industry in a way that no other business can match.  The combination of our entertainment attractions, our mission, and the method in which we link our automotive ecosystem under one umbrella provides the capability of offering services and parts for 20 percent less than our competition, thereby providing a greater profit margin.  
These business advantages will be outlined in our investor video, which will provide more fundamental insight on how we have created a better “mouse trap” for both the automotive and entertainment industries

We love to tell the stories of the people and products of Etsy. We invite our guests to see, touch, experience and purchase handmade and vintage Etsy products during their Airbnb stay. Upon arrival guests receive the keys, their Etsy credit for each night of their stay, a tablet with all of the Etsy products in the house and exclusive discounts from Etsy shops.

ProtoSphere is an immersive 3D virtual environment for business use.  Companies like Merck, Boeing, BP, Novartis and others use ProtoSphere for virtual training meetings in a persistent, always "on" environment.  Users are represented by avatars that move around in the virtual environment and can have meetings like they are physically there.  The sense of "presence" allows users to engage in a way that is more effective than GoTo Meeting or WebEx. Small Business Funding Solutions provides an achievable financing option to small and mid-sized businesses in need of working capital.  Unlike a traditional business loan that can take months to receive approval and are often denied, the Company can provide its customers the cash they need by purchasing a small, fixed percentage of the customer’s future revenue or credit card sales at a discounted rate ("Cash Advance"). 

Each Cash Advance creates an obligation of the small business to make fixed dollar repayments, in funding amounts ranging from $5,001 to $500,000, with maturities of 3 to 24 months, and returns of 1.4 times the original Cash Advance amount.

Snapwire leverages its community of 155,000 photographers in over 180 countries to deliver authentic, original photos to people who need images. Brands and businesses also pay our photographers to generate inspiration & illustrate concepts.   	 The Problem:   	 The stock photo industry uses mass archives of irrelevant, outdated, pre-shot photos. Searching for the right photo is inefficient and sometimes impossible.   	 The Solution:   	 Customers ask photographers to shoot exactly what they are looking for. Customers create a photo request, describe what they want, set a price, and a deadline. Customers get royalty-free photos that are authentic and up to date delivered to them.   	 How it works:   	 Photographers receive a request and compete by submitting their best shots. Buyers nominate their favorite photos, and build working relationships with their favorite photographers. Photographers earn points and keep 70% when their photos sell. The extra photos that aren’t purchased are curated into our Marketplace, where photographers earn revenue 50% when their photos sell. We don't share beautiful photography, we sell it.   	 Our website and mobile app is a tool for photographers to participate. We enable photographers to go from beginner to the pro level as they reach certain goals. Eventually they participate in pre-paid commissioned photo assignments from recognizable brands and clients.   	 Why us?   	 We are a need-based request platform attempting to disrupt a 70-year old industry. This new purchasing behavior has been recognized by large incumbents. For example, we’re very happy to announce our partnership with Getty Images.   	 Our product has been built to scale. Our DAU over MAU metrics suggests an active user base. Consistently featured on the Itunes App Store (Photo & Video > Discovery & Share) with 5 star ratings. Building a successful company in the stock/commercial photography space relies on a shift to mobile & social.   	 Our metrics prove this shift.   	 The biggest players in the stock photo space work with us; signed partnership deals with Getty, Adobe, Corbis, and more. Since launch in July 2014, we changed the game for thousands of image buyers worldwide.

Golden Pacific Capital, LLC is offering equity positions in a fund focused on Kansas City (“KC”) single family residential real estate. The fund is projected to return 16-20% IRR to LPs over a 6-8 year projected hold period – i.e. $270K on a $100K investment. It capitalizes on the principals’ experience having purchased and managed 2000+ homes across a number of other US cities on behalf of institutional buyers. It is a unique opportunity to participate in a limited partnership run in an institutional manner and with institutional-level returns but without the higher minimum investment thresholds usually associated with such a structure. The fund is already operating and has attracted significant equity investment. KC, unlike many other markets in the US, has been relatively stable through the past few years of macroeconomic turmoil and has only in the past 18-24 months begun to show signs of recovery. This is underpinned by a stable local economy with a highly diversified employer base. There is still very significant foreclosure activity and inventory available, and the larger players are not active in this market – a combination which gives us an opportunity to purchase at significant discount to current market value and achieve strong rental yields. Finally, the fund capitalizes on highly affordable debt available in the capital markets, as well as debt providers who have become more sophisticated and more competitively priced in recent years, a trend which we expect to continue. For further details refer to attached detailed documentation or contact us directly.

DMCHO DESIGN is a company that was created after my battle with cancer. The goal of my company is to provide a more comfortable alternative for women who go through chemo and have to wear hats.   	My hats/turbans are also very stylish. They are unique because you can wear with anything you want and they come in all different color and designs.   	DMCHO DESIGN turbans are very soft to the touch, breathable, and they are comfortable to wear. They are made with love and have a lot of thought put into them which makes each of them special.   	One day when I was going through chemo, my turban wasn't the way I wanted it. So I decided to go to a craft store and wanted to design the turbans in a creative way. The next time I went to my doctor's office the patients there were very impressed by my turbans and they asked where they could get them.   	Realizing that my dreams can become a reality and seeing patients wanting my designs put me in a state of mind to manufacture and design my turbans in Los Angeles.   	Now I am hoping that you like my designed hats, and I would be honored if you would support me in this so that patients who are going through the same thing I went through have a very beautiful hat to wear.

Tamatem  is the leading mobile games publisher in the MENA market. We are entirely focused on serving Arab smartphone users with games tailored for the language and culture of the region.  We take popular international mobile game and localize them so that they are culturally relevant for the Arab gamer. 

The Arab mobile game market is underserved. Arabic is the fourth biggest language in the world, yet less than 1% of all content is available in Arabic. While games in English number around 400,000, there are only 850 Arabic games available on the App Store. 

The region has one of the world's fastest adoption rates for mobile apps. There are 60M+ smartphone users in the Middle East and this number is expected to reach 100M by 2016. 60% of these users prefer consuming content in Arabic. 

The MENA market for mobile games is expected to more than triple in size in the coming years — from $680 million 2015 to $2.3 billion in 2022.

Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of San Francisco is strong and demand outweighs supply.

In 2010, Detroit native Dan Gilbert moved his Quicken Loans headquarters to Detroit, purchased nearly $10 billion of prime real-estate, and has dedicated most of his time to his vision for the “new” Detroit.  And since he started putting his vision into action, scores of companies (with an estimated 10,000 workers) have followed his lead and moved their offices to Detroit.
Dozens of companies, many of them in creative industries such as advertising, architecture and design, are flocking to central-city Detroit in a surprising reversal of the mass exodus to the suburbs that took place during the past half century.  (for more detail see http://www.businessinsider.com/after-filing-bankruptcy-detroit-is-on-the-verge-of-an-epic-comeback-2013-7?op=1) 
Detroit is rebounding from its “depression” of a decade ago.  However, real estate values in many areas of the city have yet to respond.  There are a substantial number of homes, owned by banks, whose values have yet to respond to the improving economy in Detroit.  (In 2010 the average price of a home was $7,500.)
New Detroit will acquire homes located in neighbourhoods which are experiencing a “rebirth”.  The homes must have been rehabilitated within the last 3 months and leased to Section 8 tenants or other acceptable tenants.  The purchase price for the homes must be such that the net cash flow, after property taxes, management fees, insurance and a repair allowance, will yield cash returns of at least 10% per annum.  
The supply of vacant homes available at discount prices is substantial.  In 2015 Wayne County estimates that 30,000 homes will be sold for delinquent taxes.  There are a number of companies which purchase foreclosed homes or homes sold for delinquent taxes.  These companies rehabilitate the homes, secure acceptable tenants and sell the leased homes.

As an added benefit to investors, all of our brands are positioned in the fastest growing segments of their market,   	Social responsibility matters to us... we believe that our stature as a company is measured equally by the positive contribution we make to the lives of people, communities and the environment, as well as by achieving financial success. All Bay Pac brands have a strong appeal for socially-minded consumers. Additionally, chain store, hotel and cruise line buyers who are actively seeking products consistent with their Corporate Social Responsibility programs are attracted to these products.   	Our current products include the FAIR line of premium spirits (a quinoa vodka, a London dry gin, an aged Belize rum, a coffee liqueur, and a goji berry liqueur), all made with Fair Trade certified ingredients.  A value-priced GMO- free French wheat vodka and a low gluten amber ale craft-brewed with quinoa are additional products.

Doc-Quick is designed to help doctors, and imaging centers, recover, or even exceed, some of the approximate $40 Billion lost each year nationwide due to cancel, and no-show appointments. These cancel/no-shows represent revenue that can never be recovered, since the time period goes unfilled. Doc-Quick helps Doctors fill those same day cancels/no-shows by providing a ready list of leads, generated in real time, where patients are asking for a same day appointment for a specific medical specialty through our Doc-Quick website.   	While the original failed appointment was probably for an existing patient, the Doc-Quick patient is, most likely, a new patient for the practice, which carries a much higher revenue opportunity for the practice. Doc-Quick brings Patients and Doctors together über fast!   	 	   	Validating the benefit to doctors/imaging centers is easy and quick. There is documented data that shows that the dollar costs to this group is as high as $40 Billion a year nationwide. On average, doctors see a no show/cancel rate of between 15% and 25%.   	Validating the benefit to the patients means defining which patients find a high benefit in same day appointments rather than waiting for weeks for the next available appointment on the calendar. What we found is that millennials do not use the health care system the way that are senior population does. What we see through research and some small survey sampling is that millennials put a high value on time and less of a value on doctor research or peer recommendations. They are our prime audience, although, in talking with baby boomers, while they put a higher value on peer recommendations, their preference on imaging and tests are time.

We have a very strong exit strategy for the small investment that is needed.  
All inclusive guest ranches are the main artery of the overall business plan.  Guests can experience five star quality in a guest ranch with us.  Lodges of well over 20,000 square feet offer indoor guest relaxation, gourmet meals of ranch natural produce and meats, entertainment, social experiences and shopping.  Privately assigned cabins and rooms provide the guest an overnight and / or a week stay in a Western theme out of the hustle and bustle of the city.  Guests sleep well, sleep soundly and dream sweet.  Refreshed is the key.  Adventure is ultimate.  Happiness achieved.
Additional all-inclusive Ranches where seasonal guests will enjoy a variety of outdoor sports.  For the avid hunter, there are well over 3000 private acres near National Forest.  
Ranches will also provide a guest to experience prime fly-fishing along the highly acclaimed Rivers lined with towering Cottonwoods.  Search no more for a truly exceptional fishing experience in Colorado with seemingly untouched access and breath-taking views.   These rivers are the best rivers for fly-fishing and supports large populations of wild rainbow, brown, brook and cutthroat trout.  After a serene day of exclusive and private fishing, step into the Ranch saloon, take a load off and enjoy an all-natural prime-rib dinner with a fine whiskey, scotch or wine.  The specialty Ranch micro-brewed beer is a must to experience as well.  Did we mention the high quality hay that is grown here, provides for all Ranch horses? Reviresco Corporation sees a substantial opportunity to divert MSW from landfill disposal utilizing the Company’s industry-disrupting process to convert the energy-rich fraction of MSW into valuable biomass fuel and deploying the resulting fuel in a highly synergistic gasification and electricity generating plant. The term “reviresco” is a Latin word meaning “to grow green again, to be renewed”, a particularly appropriate representation of our core business.   	MSW disposal in the United States is an $8.3 billion industry. Most waste goes to landfill (53%), for which waste generators, mainly municipalities, pay tipping fees, which now average almost $50/ton across the nation and have been rising at rates of nearly 3.5% annually for the last 12 years. More than 30 states are experiencing rates higher than $50/ton including ten states that contain 40% of the US population now have tipping fees at or exceeding $75/ton. Six states have fees in excess of $100/ton. Reviresco will earn tipping fees for waste disposal in lieu of landfill operators.   	Reviresco emerged from more than 5 years of research into waste disposal alternatives and more than $5 million in R&D investment, which together led to the construction of a pilot (proof of concept) plant in the United Kingdom that established a cost-effective and energy-positive system for separating and converting the organic component of municipal and other wastes into usable products.   	A single Reviresco system can of process 30,000 - 50,000 tons of unsorted, unprocessed municipal waste (from households and some institutional and commercial operations) annually, diverting more than 85% of the waste from landfill disposal.   	Reviresco presents an efficient, unique and cost-effective solution to the complex and growing problems of waste disposal for cities, towns and counties in North America and worldwide.   	Each Reviresco plant will earn investment-grade returns with guaranteed revenues from governments and major utilities.

Column Health was founded by healthcare experts and clinicians to address an unmet need in the addiction space for patients suffering from the disease of addiction – humane, ongoing, comprehensive and community based outpatient treatment.   •Successful already: We have two clinics operating at a profit in Boston metro with plans to expand in 2015 to Chicago and Austin.    Our clinics operate at an initial margin rate of 30+% increasing with economies from our central business office.   •Central business office: We have extensive expertise setting up CBO’s enabling rapid scaling across the country with greater operational effectiveness and lower costs.   •Revenue cycle specialists: our team has deep expertise in optimizing the revenue cycle including rapid payor credentialing and enrollment for fast clinic set up and cash acceleration.   •No controlled drugs, no cash on site:  Our sites do not hold controlled substances, such as Methadone or Buprenorphine, on site.  We also do not accept cash so avoid the security risks associated with those more traditional addiction treatment facilities.   •Payor advantages:  We accept all major insurance.  And because we cover the entire episode of outpatient treatment we’re able to leverage our expertise in bundled payment reimbursement, and are the first in this space to successfully establish lucrative bundled payment contracts with several of the largest national payors.  These provide guaranteed, lucrative fixed payments per month per patient - a valuable source of guaranteed patient volume in new clinics.   •Outcomes driven: Our machine learning relapse prediction tool and point of service decision support tool will enable quality consistent care across diffuse clinic locations while also identifying risks of relapse for each patient and adjusted plans of care at each patient visit to reduce relapses and increase successful outcomes of treatment.   	We are inviting you to help us tackle the epidemic at hand.

D3UC provides a Cloud-based telephone and unified communications services to technology VARs and IT MSPs that serve the small and medium business markets. Bidology offers a patented bidding platform that connects interested consumers to local service providers at no charge. Service Directories like Angie’s List, HomeAdvisor, and Thumbtack fail to fully empower the Consumer, and they charge Service Providers for leads that do not guarantee business. At Bidology, consumers enter a bid range they are willing to pay for a service to be completed. We then connect that qualified consumer to matching service providers at no charge. Once hired, we administer payment directly through our site, and release funds to the provider once the job is complete, or in milestone payments as mutually agreed upon. After the service, both the consumer and provider rate their level of satisfaction, and can even post to social media their experience. For the service, we deduct a small 2% fee from the Providers payment. Additionally, we provide value added offerings that fully empower the consumer while supporting growth within the local community.

ONe of the features of Hale Hau'oli is that we will escort our clients to physician appointments in the medical plaza, thus eliminating the need for caregivers to leave work, pick up their loved ones and take them to appointments, then return to work. THere is little competition that can meet the uniqueness of Hale Hau'oli Adult Day Care. THe experience and expertise of the management team of Hale Hau'oli will prove invaluable to making this enterprise a success. The seniors will be cared for by a well-trained, caring team, each of whom has had long-term experience in caring for the elderly. The mission of Hale Hau'oli is to provide a safe, welcoming, loving environment for our senior citizens for socialization, entertainment, and physical exercise, stimulating both mind and body, this offering daily respite for caregivers so they can maintain their daily activities, go to work or have a break from their caregiving responsibilities.

Instead of pets flying in the cargo hold where it is dangerous, the airline flew its pets, in safety, in the main cabin. 

No other airline provided this service then, no other airline provides it now.

idataMD’s suite of products serves the needs of the healthcare industry, hospital, patient, government, and the medical device vendor. idataMD provides a cloud-based software solution that captures information before, during and after surgery, filling a void in the current surgical information infrastructure and providing the first process to capture and measure the surgical process – evolving Big Data into Intelligent Digital Data. The idataMD's software applications, iVendor and iSurgery, allow medical device vendors and hospitals to utilize any web-enabled device to create an anatomical graphic depiction of exactly what occurs during surgery. The application automatically translates the resulting schematic into an intelligent, electronic operative report that links every detail of surgery, including implant location, surgical techniques, product usage, and all clinical parameters to create a dynamically new source of comparative information. As a result, vendors, hospitals, and surgeons can make real-time, data driven decisions to improve business profitability and the quality of patient care. This innovative technology results in vendor and hospital understanding cost, identifying ares of cost reductions, increased accountability, automatic creation of comprehensive anatomic implant registries, real time analytics, improved efficiencies, and compliance with existing government regulations.

According to National Association of Realtors, 88% of home buyers say they’d list their home with their agent when selling, however, only 25% actually ever do. That is a huge lost income opportunity. Agents admittedly struggle to maintain client relationships after closing. It's even more difficult for them to remain valuable. Enter HomeKeepr.

HomeKeepr connects homeowners to trustworthy local home service professionals. We do this by sourcing recommendations from highly motivated, trusted "local experts"... Real Estate Agents.  Real estate agents upload their own personal "Angie's List" to a fully branded mobile and web app that clients use to manage their homes for years after a sale.

At Maker, we’re re-imagining how Makers showcase their products online.

Millions of makers are creating amazing things, yet most are largely invisible. Discovery is their biggest challenge - search doesn’t work, going direct isn’t affordable and distribution channels only expose a fairly limited set. 

Maker is building a network to organize the world’s best makers and creating tools that help them reach a wider audience. We’ve built a new publishing platform to help Makers create a beautiful online identity, tell the stories behind their products & brands, and easily syndicate them across channels. Our curation tools allow people to scout and share their favorite makers, and increase the breadth and quality of our maker network. 

We believe that "connection" is the future of commerce. Connection through stories, not stores, that helps us discover and appreciate the people, passion and craft behind amazing products and brands.

Linear Air has entered into key partnerships with Kayak and Himpmunk, which have resulted in a favorable customer acquisition cost. Last year, the marketplace billings were $2.3 million. Linear Air’s business model is similar to other participants in the shared economy in that it owns the technology platform, and its operating partners own the aircraft.  

The air taxi market is fragmented and underutilized. The traditional booking process for air taxis is also difficult, manual and inefficient. Linear Air's technology is pioneering by providing information on air taxi flights over an online platform to enable real time booking, fare quotes, secure payments, and customer support. Linear Air has also been successful in getting air taxi flights listed on travel sites such as Kayak and Hipmunk. The technology platform provides many benefits for operating partners as well. A primary use of the current round will be development of a mobile platform.

Corrosion causes significant expenses across the market as products fail unexpectedly or need to be replaced in an accelerated time frame. Corrosion can even cause vital components to fail that lead to severe injury or death. Despite the critical importance of protecting mechanical and electrical parts from corrosion, the anti-corrosion and electric protection products that dominate the market are based on last century technology.
Nanoprotech drives away 100% of water and humidity within seconds of application, forms a flexible layer that prevents future contamination yet is only two to three microns thick, lubricates mechanical action, and is durable enough that typical applications will last for at least one year. Nanoprotech has been demonstrated to allow electric drills to operate fully while underwater and to outperform all other anticor products after mere hours of exposure to salt spray. Nanoprotech products have proven to be successful in Europe, Asia, and Africa, and Nanoprotech FL is bringing modern corrosion protection to the Americas.

Nanoprotech is looking for investors/distributors/marketing experts who would like to get a part of the firms equity for their money, extensive distribution or brand recognition input, i.e. we are not only looking for a cash investment, but other forms are also considered.

Reviticell’s management team has extensive experience in product and business development, marketing and sales, and managing successful fast-growth businesses in multiple markets in the US and abroad. Patent-pending Reviticell Kits meet the unmet need of physicians who are seeking an efficient and effective means of safely performing leading-edge regenerative medical procedures with outcomes that are predictable and consistent.

Reviticell’s plans for growth capitalize on the scalability of the Reviticell Kit system. The modularity of this system enables the production of multiple variations of the Reviticell Kit for a variety of regenerative medical purposes. As such, revenue will rapidly increase with penetration into multiple markets and production of private-labeled kits for a variety of world-class industry leaders.

Reviticell Kits comprise leading-edge technologies developed at world-class institutions and are configured with best-in-class components produced by industry leaders. The unique embodiment in each Reviticell Kit consists of a proprietary step-by-step protocol that corresponds to the components necessary to perform a particular regenerative medical procedure and provides the standardization in the industry that is sought by physicians and desired by the FDA.

Competitors market tools that leave details to the discretion of the user whereas Reviticell Kits are essentially a “Protocol-in-a-Box” for which a variety of users can conduct a given protocol in the exact same way. This “paint-by-numbers” system also enables the efficient preparation of blood or adipose tissue when performed by nurses and medical technicians who are in a supporting role.

The company is a startup (early stage), and is developed around an inventive medical apparatus called the Hospital Outpatient Module (H.O.M.).   The H.O.M. is a portable/mobile hospital bedroom, fully equipped with the components of a medical treatment room, a nurse’s station and an adjustable, computerized hospital bed.  It is to be delivered to a home, apartment, clinic, doctor’s office, public institution, etc.; and then linked to a Central Monitoring Center via the Internet for round-the-clock patient monitoring, at any location on the globe.  A working prototype will be completed within six months from full subscription.   Go to: http://www.hauserpro.com/hom   for a visual presentation.

Business Model Overview

	The H.O.M. concept is much like the idea of a paper clip:  it is so simple and obvious that “someone must have done it before.”   Fact is, no one has.  The H.O.M. equipment and the accompanying homecare and monitoring systems will be a satisfying alternative to placing a loved-one in a nursing home.  It will minimize the need for lengthy stays in a hospital; it will provide a readily available and portable “MASH” unit for the military; it will reduce the national health care expenditure by as much as one-third; and it will be reimbursable through Medicare and Medicaid and other third-party

The company buys long term care facilities and contracts out the facilities in long term leases them to solid healthcare operators. The investment is very sound do to the fact that the returns are based on rents paid by financial stable companies and healthcare being a lucrative business. Presently, we apply our 19+ years experience in contracting with Federal Express to operate 11-12 vehicles servicing an ample portion of NW PA. For the months of November and December we will be adding 4-6 additional vehicles to assist in accomodating the projected package volume increases typical for the holiday season.

The result of the economic collapse of 2008 was a 30% drop in total package volume lasting for approximately 14 months. In response to the potential for future economic disruption we have worked tirelessly to position ourselves to withstand a 34% reduction in package volume without an adverse effect on net profits.

To further strengthen our corporation, protect our shareholders and provide a secure future for our employees, Hamelly-Bruestle, Inc. intends to  sell upwards of 37% interest in the corporation. The goal being to first achieve debt free status and then to continue operating in this manner ad infinitum. Eliminating the costs of servicing debt is one benefit of adopting this type of business model in addition to that, however, bumpy economic roads may still be ahead, it is our intention to capitalize on the opportunities presented to us by those within our industry who fail to prepare for the downswing.

We help major mall retailers generate more traffic and increase sales by delivering their coupon and video ads to in-mall shoppers.

The company’s self-service, automated coupon kiosk systems will be located inside the main entrances to major malls, the choke points of their traffic.  They will  continuously deliver fresh, rotating coupons, special offers and video ad messages to the shoppers in the mall only from the merchants in that mall.  This is at a point in time when the shopper is less than a few hundred feet from the front door of the retailer whose coupon they are holding and are, defined by their very presence in the mall, almost certainly in a spending frame of mind.

Our system delivers a relevant ad message to mall shoppers at a time and place that is both geographically and psychologically superior to any other ad message delivery method, including online, search engine, TV, print, radio and direct mail.  Why?  It's because of the unique time/place that our coupons are delivered to a shopper…while standing only a few hundred feet from the retailer's front door and, by definition, almost certainly in a spending frame of mind.

For the investor who seeks and embraces calculated risk in a quest for substantial returns and who owns a basic understanding of advertising concepts, the perpetual motion marketing and quadruple revenue streams of the Coupon-A-Tron business model represents an opportunity with unlimited revenue potential.

Welcome to Colmed Medical Laboratories. Our laboratory is the leader in mobile clinical laboratory services in seven western states. Our professional laboratory phlebotomists and technicians are dispatched to hundreds of locations daily to provide collection of physician ordered laboratory tests. Colmed Medical Laboratories currently receives over 1.5 million orders for laboratory tests per year. We are trusted by hundreds of clinicians and physicians to provide accurate and timely laboratory reports on a daily basis. Our providers use accredited laboratory reports to diagnose and treat our patient population-the elderly and disabled.   	 Colmed Medical Laboratories was built to serve a need in every community. Our years of experience and refined processes have allowed us to be the largest and most efficient mobile clinical laboratory in Arizona. Our growth has allowed us to expand our efficient services to other states. We fill a need that allows the elderly and disabled to receive the best medical possible by providing physicians with timely and accurate laboratory reports.   	 Colmed Medical Laboratories is fully accredited by CLIA (Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments) and by COLA (Commission on Laboratory Accreditation). HealthViZion gathered all Performance reimbursement data for every U.S Hospital then combined “standardized” comprehensive healthcare workforce data- the only such data in the U.S. Consequently, HealthViZion uniquely sees and understands relationships, correlations, impact on ACA outcomes and revenue reimbursements. The result is scientific, high-value, high ROI ACA solutions. Solutions include: Rapid High ROI, Hospital Collaborative for increasing ACA revenue and hospital executive (COO, CFO, CNO) ACA Workforce Optimization. All Solutions are derivative Intelligence presentations of the SonarViZion platform all for the same hospital buyers. The market for ACA solutions is $11 billion annually projected to grow at 47% annually. The need for rapid high value high ROI solutions is imperative for hospitals today. Many hospitals are struggling to survive. Standard & Poor’s forecasts more ratings downgrades in 2015 expecting almost one-quarter of stand-alone hospitals to have non-stable outlooks. HealthViZion’s competitive barriers to entry are significant. 1) Selection as the sole software platform by the international and domestic Standards Committees 2) SonarViZion Hospital platform was developed over eight years. 3) The only standardized comprehensive hospital workforce data requiring 3 years and 40+ hospitals. The sales model is self-generating of all solutions, business and cost case justifying through quarterly Collaborative ACA performance and revenue benchmark reports and executive dashboards. HealthViZion has over 60 major hospital clients. Major partners in the U.S. and Asia-Pacific: Mercer, Deloitte, HRMS, ANSI, ISO and others. HealthViZion has accepted $55,000 in investment capital.

PIPR_Description: This is a prefunded purchase & rehab opportunity for a Single Family Residential property in California. The subject property address is 138 Wood Road, Los Gatos, California.   	The developer is requesting a loan of $2,668,000 in order to renovate and purchase the underlying property. The property was purchased for a total of $2,695,000 in October of 2015. There is major renovation needed for the underlying property, totaling $640,000. The borrower will receive 5 draw(s) totaling $2,668,000 over the course of the loan. The initial draw in the amount of $2,028,000 occurs at close of escrow to purchase the property. The second draw of $160,000 will be disbursed toward a quarter of line items 1-8 and after line items 9-37 are complete. The third draw of $160,000 will be disbursed toward a quarter of line items 1-8 and after line items 38-44 are complete. The fourth draw of $160,000 will be disbursed toward a quarter of line items 1-8 and after line items 45-50 are complete. The fifth draw of $160,000 will be disbursed toward a quarter of line items 1-8 and after line items 51-64 are complete and evidence of completion of the renovation is shown. $97,827 (approx. 4 months) in interest reserve will be held by Patch of Land. The borrower plans to sell in one year or less. The borrower has an option to exercise a six month extension, with an additional 0.5 percent to investors.   	138 Wood Road is comprised of two separate legal parcels. The main parcel is comprised of approximately 4.32 acres and includes the 2,711 sq. ft. residence and pool. The second parcel is approximately 0.63 acres and consists of land only. The project includes converting the existing 2 parcels into separately buildable lots of approximately 2.5 acres each through a lot line adjustment. The existing residence on the main parcel will be completely remodeled and expanded by approximately 800 sq. ft. The second parcel will be prepared for sale as a package with appropriate approvals and potential plans for construction of a 3,500 sq. ft. home. Borrower states that all these steps have been verified as feasible with extensive in-depth consultations with the Los Gatos City Planning department, architects, survey and report engineers, and contractors.   	Please note that the ARV of 45% for this project is based upon the lot line adjustment, approved entitlements, and the sale of the two parcels separately as planned. If the developer is not able to proceed with a lot line adjustment, the backup plan is to proceed with development of the home and market the property as a residence with a larger combined lot at a higher price. This would result in an ARV of 71% based on the appraisal value of this contingency plan.   	The initial investment needed for this property is in the amount of $2,028,000 to purchase the property. The combined renovation draws for this project will be raised at a later time as they are requested.   	138 Wood Road   	Purchase Price: $2,695,000 	Renovation: $640,000 	After-Rehab Value: $5,923,000   	An independent third party appraisal commissioned by Patch of Land, shows an After Repair Value (ARV) of $5,923,000 for 138 Wood Road. This includes the ARV for the two separate lots. The ARV ratio is 45.04% and is in line with the data we found during our due diligence process. Our research shows the residential market surrounding the underlying property in this area of Los Gatos is stable supply demand balance.

PIPR_Description: Founded in 2012, Circle Technology is seeking $500,00 in equity capital investment. The pedigree of the executive team includes significant experience in enterprise collaboration technology in which they have led multiple successful IPO/public companies.   	This technology, patented (2 patents awarded, 1 pending), is now out of beta, producing revenue with Fortune 500 companies as clients.  Strategic partnerships with industry leading resellers have already been established, and this company is set to experience a significant CAGR over the next few years.  Funds are to be used to maintain continuing updates/engineering of multi-platform software and further develop sales channels in identified and active verticals.   	As the company exits its pilot runs, rapid growth is expected from sales and intellectual property positions.  The general industry of presentation, collaboration, and screen sharing among devices is dynamic.  This application is unique, with competitors offering only less secure, internet dependent imitations.   	The company’s technology is the future of wireless presentations and collaboration, allowing such execution via direct screen sharing technology.  The multi-platform enabled system uses WiFi chip bifurcation to disseminate anything from one device to multiple devices with no exposure to insecure networks.  The software targets the problem of unreliable and unpredictable access to collaboration and presentation devices, as well as the security risks inherent with internet dependent systems. Existing competitors in the market require internet connections and intermediary servers, pushing sensitive materials and collaboration through the web.  Given the sensitive nature of collaboration and presented materials in enterprise applications, (system breach, user compromise etc.), this company’s technology is superior, in that it provides a secure, direct system to share from one device with up to 40 others.

At LemmeChat, we know there is a simpler, faster, and more direct way for people to share their experiences across multiple devices and platforms. Therefore, we are building LemmeChat from the ground up to provide users with the first app designed solely to improve the way they connect and share experiences with their closest friends and family.

Equon is primed to move its antibodies into pre-clinical trials in preparation for FDA approval treating both Rheumatoid Arthritis and Late Phase Asthmatic Response.  Due to the nature of many other autoimmune conditions, it is highly likely that Equon's antibodies will be able to treat other conditions, expanding the market opportunities.

The estimated market size for those that suffer from Late Phase Asthmatic Response is 2.3 million people and there is currently no competition in the marketplace for a preventative solution such as the one Equon is proposing.  Today individuals who suffer from this type of response need to seek immediate medical attention to restore the ability to breathe.  When the antibodies are taken by the patient on a monthly basis, it will prevent the late phase asthmatic response from happening within the body.   The target is to have FDA approval by 2019 and achieve a 25% penetration rate by 2021 with an annual sales target of $673 M.

Rheumatoid Arthritis impacts an estimate of 1.5 million people.  There is substantial competition in the space including drugs such as Humira.  However, most of the drugs offered to treat patients with Rheumatoid Arthritis have significant side effects including but not limited to the development of cancer and in severe cases death.  Equon’s antibodies will be able to provide a much safer solution with the expectation of minimal side effects.  Equon forecasts FDA approval by year end 2020 and will achieve a 25% penetration rate into the market by 2023 with an annual sales estimate of $661 M.   

The antibody development will be following a specific series of development of which would be incredibly challenging for competitors to replicate.  Some of the keys areas are the human fusion partners, a series of proteins along with the time necessary to gain FDA approval.  It is for these reasons Equon will not be submitting a patent and will be keeping this process a trade secret.

Elite Agent Realty started as a concept back in 2010 and eventually incorporated in 2012. through our ingenuity and ability to keep our company current with the ever changing real estate market we have thrived while others fell to the way side.   	Real Estate is a $50 Billion a year  industry and 90% of those clients, both sellers and buyers, start their real estate search online. Elite Agent Realty knows the office building has become obsolete. Our virtual business model not only makes sense in today’s internet driven marketplace but also let’s us expand 10x faster than our competition at a fraction of the cost.   	This also gives us the ability to target markets that ensure profits for the company and most importantly our shareholders. We look for markets with a minimum 5000 homes sold a year and an average sales price of $600,000 or more. Our goal is to service 5% of any particular market place within 3 years and 15% within 10. With a gross brokerage take home of 1.25% of each home's sales price and a 60% profit margin that’s a minimum $1,125,000 annual profit per team at year three.   	Over the past year we have been researching and speaking with some of the most successful agents across the country to developed our new marketing strategy. We limited our initial proof of concept to two weeks. Our focus was on The Tri-Valley area of the East Bay  with annual home's sales of 5200 and an average sales price of $918,000. We only touched 25% of the online market and received 81 leads at an average cost of $40.99 per lead. Of those leads we are working 4 Listings and 5 buyers totaling $7.7 Million in sales volume, or $96,250 in Gross Commission Income. Our goal is a 5% conversion rate, but it’s too early in our implementation to get true conversion numbers just yet. That being said even if we get one out of those 81 leads into contract, we are looking at a 222% ROI.

In addition, YAW will offer e-commerce and advertising opportunities and provide a revenue share to its Clients.

Let’s face it, we are an on demand economy.  Today, it’s possible to use your skills and passion to help others online and even get paid handsomely while doing so.  Our new company, Politehelp, makes it easy for anyone to provide their talent and services to others in their own neighborhood and around the world.  We are insuring that everyone has the opportunity to work. 
	
    Hello, my name is Sanem Avcil and Politehelp is an innovative app that gets our customers needs met either online or in person.  No more waiting in long lines.  No more frustration.  No fuss.  Whatever you need done, it is handled quickly.  With Politehelp, it does not matter even if you need your car or bike fixed, or your apartment cleaned, our app makes it possible for you to find someone nearby to help you so you never leave home.  How genius is that?  Additionally, if you need a new resume, graphic design, animation, business consulting, etc., we also have you covered at Politehelp. 
	
    How does Politehelp work?  Freelancers come to our site and advertise their skills, talent, and services.  A customer reaches out and chooses from a database of freelancers, pays a fee to work with that person, and then the service is began. Only after the work is completed is the freelancer paid.  We take a percentage of their fee.  Everyone is happy and it is a win-win for all involved.   
How do we generate revenue?  For everyone who offers their services on our site, we take 20%.  
	So how are we different from our competitors?  Unlike Fiverr, Upwork, PeoplePerHour, and Elance, our app is based on augmented reality coupled with great neighborhood service.  We are far more than an online help portal like the others.  Politehelp can take things offline and come directly to your home or office to assist you.  These other sites do not do all that we can do.
